You look down through the hole, hoping to find an opportune moment to slip out and escape this giantess. Past your miniscule legs dangling from under the elastic band holding you in you see the enormous tanned, toned leg that threatened to stomp on you so recently extending down to the floor, where it tapers into her foot and disappears into her shoe. All you have to do is wait for her to stop moving, or better yet sit down, and you can slide down this monolith of a leg and make your escape.

While you wait for your opportunity to run, you watch the floor turn to the ceiling as the tent that is Fulda's skirt falls away, letting light shine on you for a brief second, before it reverts back to the floor. You feel centripetal force pulling on you as she continues flipping like this, and you hold on tightly - sure, you wanted to get free, but not like this! As she continues spinning the forces get harder to resist, and you feel your hold slipping.
1111112121111111212.title: Cheerleading Hazards

11111121211111112121.content:
Fulda flips herself over again, and you're wrenched up and out by the force generated as she does so. You slide along her titanic leg, trying frantically to grab anything with your hands. Unfortunately for you her legs were freshly shaven and you're unable to find anything to stop your rapid ascent. In half a moment you fly past her knees, and reach out to snag onto her shoelace. Your arms grasp for the massive white ropes, the last thing that can stop you from flying away.

They're moving too fast, and you miss. Now nothing can stop you as you're catapulted through the air, flailing wildly as you try to gain some control. Below you Fulda continues her backflips, the giant cheerleader's red braid whipping back and forth. Some distance away you see the other cheerleaders, your sister included, getting ready to form a human pyramid, entirely oblivious to your miniscule form sailing several feet above Fulda. You see that she's doing her flips on a line of mats, finally some luck was coming your way.

You briefly hang at the apex, feeling yourself go weightless before you come crashing back to the ground. As you descend the red mat rushes up to greet you, impressing just how fast your plummet was. When you land you form a slight indentation, but again you're lucky - the mat was made out of firm foam rather than hard plastic. There's a loud thud and rumble behind you, and you roll over to see what caused it.

What little luck you had was just about to run out. The backs of two enormous white tennis shoes were there, with humongous tanned legs sticking out of them. They quickly disappear again, replaced by massive hands and a red braid hanging down. There's another colossal thud and rumbling, and the shoes are back, this time closer. They go up again and slam back down a second later, even closer. One more time her feet go up and crash down, this time mere inches from where you're lying. Her feet go up one more time, but this time no hands come down to replace them. You look up with trepidation and see her coiling into a massive ball directly above you. She starts to fall back down.
11111121211111112121.title: Up in the Air

111111212111111121211.content:
You lie on the mat, unable to move and paralyzed with fear as the gigantic redheaded cheerleader uncoils above you. Her right leg goes forward and her left back, stretching out for what seems like forever. She continues falling, the black ceiling of fabric under her skirt looming above you like an asteroid as it races toward your head. All around you her skirt touches down, casting you into dim red-tinted light.

You scream, for all the good it does. Instantaneously after her skirt tent forms her body slams into you. All you see is an impossibly huge wall of black as her pelvis lands on you, crushing you under her taint. As your body is broken when this massive girl lands on it, all you can think about is how you finally got to be between a cheerleader's legs.

Fulda, however, doesn't even hear your tiny body crunch as all your bones are broken, and will forget about you shortly after she can't find you after practice.
111111212111111121211.title: What Goes Up Must Come Down

11111121211111112122.content:
You cling as tightly as you can to the band of Fulda's panties. She lands after a flip, causing you to slide out but not fall to the floor. For a second you dangle from her panties, your entire body brushing against her gigantic, muscular leg as you sway, before she goes into another flip. You're forced back against her panties as her skirt rolls back, a sequence which repeats several times.

At last Fulda coils in both of her legs when she jumps, and you find yourself pressed between the back of her her ankle and thigh. Sensing an opportunity you wrap yourself around her ankle, and when she opens her form you're pulled away from her as she extends the leg forward. You look down from the tree trunk of an ankle you're clinging to, and see the red mat rushing towards you. Though you somewhat regret your decision, you look towards your feet and see Fulda's powerful calf muscle extends much lower than you hanging from her ankle.

Before you can appreciate the irony of Fulda's legs saving you for once her body slams full force into the ground, knocking your grip loose and causing you to slam into the mat. You're somewhat dazed from the shockwave the enormous cheerleader made when she landed, and barely notice when her ankle is no longer covering your entire view. She pulls her foot back under her and stands, then brushes a hand against her butt. She's looking for you.

You try to remain still, which being stunned makes rather easy. With a glance upward you see your giant captor looking back and forth, trying to see where you had escaped to.
11111121211111112122.title: Flipping Great

111111212111111121221.content:
A pair of cold blue eyes locks onto you, and Fulda's mouth spreads into a surprised smile. In just a second she's swiped you up again, her mammoth hand pressing your stunned self into her palm. The next thing you know she opens her hand, and you find yourself mere inches from her lips. "Thought you could get away, you little pest?" she whispers. "Forget that you're my pet?" She bites the air in front of you, letting you see into her cavernous gullet. "I'll make you pay for that." She opens her mouth again, and starts tilting her hand towards her mouth.

You shake off your dazed state and cry out, "No! Don't eat me!" Fulda closes her mouth, and reforms it into a smirk.

"That'd be letting you off easy, insect. I'll have to think of something suitable to punish you for running away. Right now, though," she picks you up between the thumb and forefinger of her other hand, "I have to get back to practice." Before you can protest she drops you back in her skirt, and warns, "Now I don't want to see you again until I take you out of there after practice, do I make myself clear?"

You're held firmly against Fulda's butt, tight enough that you won't slide around despite the sweat starting to form. You try to take yourself out of the situation mentally, but with every step she takes you're bounced between her tight butt and panties.

"Fulda, get up that pyramid!" you hear an unfamiliar voice say.

"I'm, like, the biggest person here, by far," she answers. "Wouldn't it make more sense for me to be on the bottom?"

"It's your turn," the stranger answers. "Just try not to fall off."

"Okay, but if something goes wrong I'm probably going to crush anybody I land on to paste." You're pressed tighter into her buttcheek as she climbs the human pyramid, and feel the uneasiness as she sways back and forth. "Almost there," you hear her mutter to herself, and feel her butt clench. You guess she's at the top, since her panties pull even tighter over you as she bends over, forming the top of the pyramid.
111111212111111121221.title: Top of the Pyramid

1111112121111111212211.content:
Time marches on as the fabric from Fulda's panties continues pushing you into her buttcheek, and it's getting harder to breathe. The heat she's putting off isn't making things easier, and you feel that if this goes on much longer you're going to be in some serious trouble. You feel the mammoth mound behind you shifting again, and you're tipped end over end as the fabric loosens on you. Seconds later you're rattled to the core, and a loud thud resounds as Fulda lands back on the ground.

"Good practice today, girls," the strange voice says. "Remember we have the competition next week, so be sure to practice in your down time. Now go shower and go home!"

You're jostled as Fulda walks excitedly off the gym floor, each step dropping you slightly further down her buttock. When she finally stops you're entirely under her, with the entirety of her huge cheek resting atop you but supported by her panties. "Those were some nice moves, Fulda," a voice high above you says. You think you might recognize it, but can't be sure. "Getting ready to show off for somebody?"

"Might be, Megan," Fulda replies. Your sister! You start thrashing around, trying to get free so you can get back to her. "I'll tell you all about him later, we should probably hurry and get showered, right?"

"Hmm, right," Megan answers. "Seeya later." You hear her walk off, and stop thrashing. There was no way you'd be able to get out of Fulda's panties anyway, not on your own. Almost as if on cue a trio of enormous fingers pulls back the waistband on Fulda's skirt and panties, and a hand descends into them. There's nowhere to run anyway, and a finger pushes on you, holding you firmly in place. You're snatched up immediately, and after a brief whirlwind of motion you're set down at the bottom of Fulda's locker.

When her hand retracts you see you're standing at about waist level to the giantess as she stands there, blocking your view of the rest of the room. Your eyes scroll up her uniform, over the letters which are larger than you are and past her ample bosom to her face to see she's already looking down at you. She leans forward, making her body loom over you, and slams her hands into the shelf behind you, making you feel totally boxed in. "I hope you enjoyed that, turd," she says when she feels you've been properly menaced. "Don't worry, you're coming home with me and we'll get to do stuff like that all. Over. Again." Her mouth twists into a sadistic grin. "You better be in here when I get back, too. If I see you outside of here I may just forget about how close we were just now and-" she punctuates her sentence by lifting up her hand and slamming it down in front of you, creating a deafening racket and throwing you to your back.

The locker closes, but opens again momentarily. Before you can see anything, a torrent of red fabric cascades down on you as Fulda drops her uniform. "See you in five," she whispers, then slams the door.
1111112121111111212211.title: Practice is Over

11111121211111112122111.content:
While Fulda's gone you push and struggle to get out from under her uniform. With every bit of progress you make it seems like the way out only gets more complex and blocked off. After two minutes with no end to the enormous uniform in sight you make your way back to the locker's "floor" and wait it out in a wrinkle where the uniform wasn't touching the metal. You couldn't escape even if you wanted to, this thing must have weighed 4, 5 pounds!

Your wait ends when you hear metal slamming against metal, and then the handle wrenching open. Two gigantic hands tear the cheer uniform from on top of you, and you see Fulda looking down. Her long red hair had been let out and was falling straight down her back, and she was wearing a dark green shirt. For once, she actually seems excited to see you.

"You're still here!" she exclaims. "I'm torn. On the one hand I was looking forward to hunting you down out there and squashing you. On the other hand..." She reaches down and plucks you up between her thumb and forefinger, then lifts you up to her face. You can see she's wearing some light lip gloss. "Now I can take you home with me. My parents aren't home right now so nobody will be able to hear your pathetic little cries for help but me, and I think they're hilarious." Fulda smiles cruelly while she dangles you in front of her face.

"The only problem is getting you there. You'll probably be smashed in my pocket, and something might fall on you in my purse. I can't put you in my shoe or sock for the same reason. Don't even think about suggesting I put you in my bra, either; I'm not that excited about tormenting you." She ponders for a moment, then snaps her fingers. Without saying anything she pulls a light blue ribbon from her hair and begins lowering you down. You see she's wearing a jean skirt that barely went even halfway down her long, lean thighs, leaving most of her tanned legs bare down to her ankle socks and low-top Converse.

You're lowered past the hem of her skirt and raised back up, then held against the inside of her right thigh. Her other hand comes up now with the ribbon, and she hastily drapes it over you. "Put your arms over that so that you can hang from it," she orders. "That's like a three foot drop, you'd splatter as soon as you hit the ground." You do as you're told, and Fulda ties the ribbon so that it's incredibly tight but secure. You glance up and see stark white panties, and down to see her black Converse.

"I'm not doing this as any sort of favor to you, bug," she explains. "Some older girls are giving me a ride, and you have no idea how screwed you'd be if they saw you. Let me just say you'd be lucky if they only squeezed you until all your bones broke and then swallowed you alive. Just don't make a sound and you should be fine." You gulp. That seemed oddly specific, like maybe she had planned to do that. Your thoughts are interrupted when your body is involuntarily shot forward as Fulda takes a step. To keep from getting dizzy you focus on her shoes, each crevice and crease in the canvas, and especially the sound it makes as it hits the ground.

Your ride stops, and you hear a car door open. Fulda sits, letting you see the back of a car seat through her skirt, and closes the door. She clicks her seat belt, and the car starts. If you're going to do anything, it's now or never.
11111121211111112122111.title: Leaving with Fulda

111111212111111121221111.content:
You're perfectly aware that at this point struggling is the last thing you should do. Fulda had been bad enough by herself, and these girls were apparently her friends. You reasoned they wouldn't be any easier on you than she had, and would probably only encourage each other to come up with more sadistic ways to torment you.

That doesn't mean the ride is easy. Fulda's ribbon continues putting firm pressure on you, and after a few minutes you feel your arms go to sleep. You kick your legs, trying to push yourself up and relieve some of the strain. Your captor must have felt you, since she adjusts her skirt and pushes you back to where you had been.

"Are you feeling better, Fulda?" asks one of the girls from the front seat. Fulda adjusts herself before responding, lifting up her other leg and moving it over. You have no way to get out of the way as she brings it back down, laying her thigh on top of you as she finished crossing her legs. You can't make out anything else they say while you gasp for breath and try to adjust to the heat, though you know when Fulda speaks due to the deep, oddly pleasurable vibrations all around your body.

At last the car comes to a stop, and you're released from your fleshy tomb. Your view whirls around as Fulda swings her tapered legs to the side, and then again as she stands fully erect. You hear a car door slam, and your world is thrown back into tumult as she walks forward, each step churning you like a piston in addition to the vertigo you have from being three feet off the ground.

After what seems like an hour of torment Fulda gets inside her house. You hear the calamity of her keys being dropped on a table, and despite not being able to see through her skirt you can tell her family's rather well-off from the tile below you. Wordlessly Fulda moves to the kitchen, apparently stands motionless for several minutes, and then moves away again. You're beginning to worry she's forgotten about you.

Gigantic footfalls thunder up to you as her gigantic sneakers pound on the stairs. You close your eyes for the duration, and open them again to see the ground is now soft and beige, undoubtedly carpet, meaning you were probably in Fulda's room. A gigantic hand crawls up her skirt towards you, and the fingers deftly untie the ribbon binding you to her thigh. You plummet down her leg, slide past her knee and go barreling beside her calf until you impact the carpet. Luckily you're unharmed, but the landing does smart a bit.

On either side you see the black and white stripes of her colossal Converse sneakers, and looking up you see her towering legs. Without even acknowledging she's released you Fulda tilts so that she topples onto her bed, then swings her legs up onto it. "I made you some food, bug," she declares, not even looking at you, "but it's also for me. If you want some you have to come get it." You look up and see a sandwich resting on a plate on her lap, and to either side sheets drape from her mattress onto the floor, providing you a way up.
111111212111111121221111.title: Fulda's House

1111112121111111212211112.content:
You let out an exasperated sigh. Fulda really had you under her foot now - you hadn't eaten since you got shrunk, and this was probably as generous as she was going to get. If you had to scavenge her crumbs for dinner, then so be it, and she might be more generous with breakfast if you try.

You begin jogging towards the foot of her bed, wanting to conserve energy for the climb and subsequent traps Fulda no doubt has planned. As you approach an object several times your size slams into the carpet, shocking you out of your focused jog. A second later an identical object follows, and rolls to block your path. Black canvas and white laces reveal them to be the shoes Fulda was wearing. Sure enough you look up and see her stretching her toes inside her socks.

With effort you hoist yourself atop Fulda's empty shoe, using her laces to help give you leverage. Hurriedly you stroll across, then slide down the tip of her shoe and break into a run on the carpet. It's difficult to get firm footing on the surface, and with each step you sink halfway up your shin into the carpet fibers. Though it takes some time you do eventually reach her bed sheets, and surprisingly Fulda doesn't try to squish you again.

You grip the sheets tightly and scamper up as much as you can. When your feet leave the ground the sheet you're holding on to begins to swing, making you cling to the white fabric. It's a slow swing due to your negligible weight though, and you're brought to a gentle stop against the bed post. Seizing a section of the sheet you swing your legs up and begin walking up the post as well as you can.

The climb takes some time, even though you've done your best to make it easier, but you do eventually make it. Your exhausted body sprawls out just a few inches from the foot end of her mattress, and you find yourself face to ankle with Fulda - you look left and see her feet on the railing, and right to see her head propped up against the headboard a foot above the mattress. Damn, she really is a giantess.

"I guess you're not that hungry," Fulda teases. "I've eaten most of your dinner already though, and I'm still not full. You should hurry before I finish it, I might decide I want a light snack afterward if you don't." You need to get up to that plate five minutes ago. Your eyes dart between her ankle and the mattress along her as you try to decide which route to take.
1111112121111111212211112.title: The Bed Summit

11111121211111112122111121.content:
You dash forward and plant your foot on her ankle bone protruding towards you, then use that to hop on top of her ankle. There's not even time to steady yourself before Fulda starts to shift, lifting up her other leg. Without thinking you roll forward onto Fulda's shin, just clearing the area as her other ankle sets down. Having just narrowly avoided being crushed you turn back and see two indomitable white pillars waving back and forth as Fulda casually fidgets.

Not wanting to wait around and find out how else Fulda can try to smash you, you begin running up her leg. For once you're glad that you're so small - if you were a few inches taller you'd have much less leeway on her shins and probably go sliding off. Your feet sink a bit into her soft skin, providing you extra traction on the tanned titaness's leg.

Just as you're coming up on her knee, the ground beneath you begins to shake. Fulda is shaking her hips back and forth, causing her legs to tremble. It's a very slight effect, but to your tiny body it feels like you're about to be shaken apart. "Oh no, earthquake!" Fulda shouts in mock shock as you stagger into her other leg for balance. She continues gyrating as you proceed, slowing your advance considerably.

Finally you pass her knee, the halfway point of your journey. You're about to slide into the crevice between her thighs to minimize the shaking effect when Fulda declares, "The aftershocks are always worse, though!" Before you can ponder what she means by that the ground underneath you rises sharply as she bends her legs, pulling her feet in. She slides her feet all the way up to her butt, putting you around two feet in the air when you suddenly stop. The inertia of the rise throws you off of her leg and into the air, falling towards her.

Your flight takes you over the plate with her mostly-eaten sandwich and into her boobs. Luckily you hit the side and merely bounce off her breast, sending you crashing back onto the plate. Fulda's hand glides over you and plucks up the bite of sandwich left then gingerly shoves it into her mouth. Looking around you see the plate strewn with crumbs the size of your fist. The giantess swallows her food and looks down at you menacingly. You begin to wither under her gaze when she finally speaks.
11111121211111112122111121.title: A Dangerous Body

choices: Hide and go seek, of course!
You're going to run an obstacle course!
111111212111111121221111211.content:
Before she can change her mind you snatch up the nearest morsel of bread and start devouring it. After all, you were starving, and if this was all you were going to get you weren't going to let it go to waste. The first crumb is gone in a few seconds, and you dive to the next one.

"You seem glad to be eating my trash," she teases. You shove another handful of bread into your mouth, and pick up a sliver of turkey that fell out. Fulda begins tapping her fingers impatiently as you hurriedly eat, making the plate wobble back and forth. The disturbance makes you pause in your feast as you try to get your footing amid the quakes.

"Already done?" Fulda asks. "Just as well, I was getting disgusted watching that. You eat like a savage." Before you can protest she's already gripped the plate and turned it over, dumping you onto her belly. You lie on the dark green fabric, admiring the denim and skin mountain rising up behind you, as Fulda's steady breathing buffets you up and down. You're brought back to the task at hand by a loud thud as Fulda flicks her stomach beside you.

"Hey. Eyes up here," she orders, glaring down at you. "I have a problem, and that means you do, too. I'm bored!" She pauses and lets a sly smirk cross her face. "Luckily I have a new toy to play games with. You like games, don't you?"

"Yeah," you respond, "But I'm not sure how fair-"

"Good, then we're going to play one!" she interrupts. "Okay, so here's the deal: if you win, I'll let you sleep in my bed." She pauses and winks at you before continuing. "But if you lose, I'm probably going to step on you. I might do something else, it depends on how creative I feel then."

"What are we playing?"

"I'm so glad you asked!"
111111212111111121221111211.title: A Feast!

1111112121111111212211112111.content:
"I'll give you a bit to choose a spot, and then I'll come looking for you," Fulda explains. "You'll have to stay hidden for five minutes, but as soon as I see you, that's it." She lifts you off her stomach and drops you on the bed beside her, then swings her legs over the side. The mattress bends as she sits up, rolling you to her butt. You're bounced up as she stands, then she turns and bends down over you. "You better be ready when I come back." Then she turns around and leaves, picking up her shoes as she exits.

You needed to hide well to keep this demented girl from stomping you into the carpet. From your vantage point on the bed you looked around, surveying the room for a place that could keep you safe for a whole ten minutes. The window was closed, meaning you couldn't outright escape, and she left you on the bed - she'd probably look there first. Under the bed wasn't a much better idea, it'd make sense for her to go there second.

To your left there's a dollhouse on the floor, probably forgotten about a long time ago, and a closed door likely going to her closet. If there's furniture in the dollhouse you could hide under that might be a good idea, but if she hasn't forgotten it she'll almost certainly look there.

In front of you is a chest of drawers with a small gap at the bottom. You'd be exposed in the gap, but it was only open on the front side and there were some decorative legs that could almost totally conceal you. Unfortunately all the drawers were closed, so you can't hide among her clothes.

On the right there are several pairs of shoes laid out, ranging in style from running shoes to high heels. There were about ten pairs in a row, and if she checked every single one it would take too much time. Possibly this is your best bet.

"You've got one minute, filth, then I'm going to hunt you!" Fulda announces from behind the door. You dash off to the spot you've chosen.
1111112121111111212211112111.title: Choosing a Spot

11111121211111112122111121111.content:
You hop off the side of the mattress onto the frame, then slide down the grooved bedpost to reach the carpet. The line of shoes is to your right, starting with a massive cross-trainer you could comfortably fit inside. Choosing the first one would basically be suicide though, so you continue on past that, a pair of flip-flops, some flats and open-toed shoes until you reach your destination: a pair of 4-inch heels.

Quickly you pull yourself up onto the toe, and look inside. Not enough room, you surmise, and get ready to move over to the next pair. As you jump however you slip, and fall between the two high-heeled shoes. Before you can get back up the door opens, and Fulda declares, "Ready or not, here I come!" Out of time you decide to hide under the heel and hope she won't notice.

You can see through the crack between the toes of this pair of shoes, and watch Fulda walk up to the bed. She picks up the sheets and blankets one by one and shakes them out, then throws them on the ground. "I guess you're not a complete moron, at least," she says as she flips the mattress onto its side. "You're not under it, either. No problem, I still have a lot of time left."

Next she goes over to the dollhouse. She stands there for a moment, then bends down and tears off the roof. Her hand reaches in and pulls out a bed, which she briefly inspects and places back in. Then she flips a latch and tears the top floor off so that she can get at the first floor. Fulda spends a bit tipping over more furniture in there before standing back up. "I'm disappointed in you, don't you want to see what your new house is like?" she teases.

She moves on, going between the dresser and bed, and briefly gets on her hands and knees to look underneath it. Briefly she shines a flashlight inside, flicking it left and right to see behind the legs, then gets back up. No witty remark, and she's running out of time.

"Oh, you daft little pipsqueak," she says as she turns the corner. "If you're in my shoes you'll have made me the happiest girl alive, and squishing you will be so much easier." The clock ticks down as she picks up each shoe individually and shakes it out, then peers inside. You bide your time until the shoe next to you is picked up, letting light pour into your crevice under her heel, though you remain out of sight. She puts the shoe back down, and you hold your breath waiting for the shoe you're under to be picked up.
11111121211111112122111121111.title: Hunted

111111212111111121221111211111.content:
The alarm on Fulda's phone sounds before she can lift up the shoe you're under. "I don't know how you did it, you little twerp, but you survived," she announces. "Come on out so I don't accidentally step on you later." You sheepishly leave your hiding spot and walk between the high heels, presenting yourself to Fulda. She was sitting on her knees, with her thighs shooting up into the sky like darkened pillars.

"A shoe guy, huh?" she asks. "You might actually enjoy tomorrow then." She stops, and lets out a huge yawn. "But I'm tired now, and that means you're tired." Fulda snatches you up before you can react and holds you in front of her face. Roughly she switches you to her other hand, and wraps all of her fingers around you, constricting your body so that only your head's poking out.

Fulda glowers down at you as she stands, and you do your best not to look down. Silently she carries you across the room, and gets back down on her knees by the dollhouse. She holds you a few inches above the second floor and drops you on your back. "Try not to get any smaller tonight," she says, and turns to put the roof back on.

"But you said-" you begin, but Fulda interrupts.

"Yeah, I said my bed." She rests her arms on the dollhouse's wall then leans against them. "I own this, and it's a bed. Therefore, you're sleeping in my bed." She waits there a moment, her face filling the sky where the roof should be and her breasts pushed up by her hands. "Did you think I was going to let you sleep with me or something? You're such a gross little pervert, be glad I'm giving you this much." She puts the roof back on and snaps it into place. "And you better be in there tomorrow morning!"

You watch through the window as her tanned legs retreat, then make your way to the bed. It's really not too bad, you notice, since it's made of actual wood, and the mattress appears to be a miniature one like hers. The light outside goes out, plunging you into darkness, so you lay down and pull the blanket over you. It seems like the bed was made for someone just your size, too. "Good night, Fulda!" you shout as you close her eyes, but the giantess either doesn't hear you or simply ignores you, and you fall asleep.
111111212111111121221111211111.title: Bed Time

1111112121111111212211112111112.content:
When morning comes, you awaken entirely under the blanket. That's weird, you think, it didn't seem like it was that big last night. Must've been a trick of the light. You sigh as you remember your predicament, and turn to place your feet on the floor. Instead you miss your mark, and shove yourself off the bed. Curious you turn around and find that your eyes barely clear the top of the mattress. The bed definitely wasn't that big last night.

A loud crash sounds from the wall, and the entire house reverberates from the impact. "Come on out, pet, it's time to play!" Fulda calls. You look out the window onto the balcony, and see a column of tanned skin. Oh no. That crazy girl is waiting for you, and she'll surely notice something's wrong.

While you're panicking and trying to figure out what to do, an enormous blue eye appears in the window. "I can see you! Don't be lazy, I want to play with you!" she entreats again. You dive behind the bed, trying to hide yourself from her sight. Plus, she's had all night to think of ways to "play" with you, and you didn't particularly want to find out any of them.

"I was going to be nice to you today," she begins, "but you want to be difficult." Fulda moves her eye from the window and it's replaced by her leg. "If you aren't out here in ten seconds I'll tear the roof off this house and take you out, and I won't be gentle about it."

Well, nothing else you can do. You slump your shoulders and walk out onto the balcony, and discover that you're only as tall as the railing. Fulda is standing astride the balcony, her legs blocking your view on either side. Quickly you glance down and see that she's wearing the same shoes from the night before, then your eyes follow her legs all the way up to see that she's wearing a black miniskirt and white panties. Continuing up you see she's wearing a white long sleeve shirt that conforms to every curve she has, and has her red hair tied up in a ponytail. She's looking down at you, seemingly very satisfied.

"There, that wasn't so hard, was it?" She bends down to put you at eye level. "Wait, you're like half the size you were yesterday. I gave you one job, and you couldn't do it!" You move to shield yourself from her imminent wrath, but instead she just smiles. "It's not like it makes a big difference. Ten times your height or twenty, I can still crush you. Hell, it's even easier now. But we have things to do before we can get to that!"
1111112121111111212211112111112.title: Half the Man You Were

11111121211111112122111121111122.content:
Fulda holds her hand in front of you, palm up. "Hop on," she says, "I'll take you downstairs to get some food." You hesitate, unsure if you can trust the giantess who threatened to smash you so many times the day before. She must have noticed your reluctance and adds, "I'm trying to be nice to you today, but you're not making it easy. If you want I can snatch you up and carry you there in my fist. It won't be very comfortable and you'll probably break some bones at the very least." You shrug, and climb over the balcony like a wall and jump off onto her pinky, then roll the rest of the way into her palm.

"Now was that so hard?" she asks as she stands. "If you don't like me being nice I can always go back to being mean, you know. How would you like that?" She brushes a strand of hair out of her eye and begins walking down the stairs. The vibrations from her footfalls shake you even in her palm, but Fulda's surprisingly careful about keeping you from getting thrown about.

She moves her hand from her side up to her face and spends a moment peering at you, her monumental blue eyes narrowing as they inspect you from above. "You are seriously little, though. Like, yesterday I thought you were little, but now you're small even compared to that." She quickly sizes you up with her thumb and index finger, and declares, "Yep, seriously little. Two inches at most, I'm six feet taller than you at least!" You groan inwardly, and she follows up, "You're not going to keep getting smaller, are you?"

"I don't know," you answer. "This whole shrinking thing is new to me. I could stop here, maybe at an inch. For all I know I'll keep shrinking until I can sleep on one of your eyelashes."

Fulda jokingly bats her eyes at you. "Hmm, nah. You wouldn't be a very good pet that small, I'd crush you long before then." Before you can reply, she announces, "We're here!" and heads over to the table. She tilts her hand, letting you slide off onto the white tablecloth, and leans her head in close. As you regard her nose that matched you in length, she says, "I really look forward to sharing this meal with you."
11111121211111112122111121111122.title: The Most Important Meal of the Day

111111212111111121221111211111221.content:
You're left alone on the table momentarily while Fulda gets out a bowl, some milk and a box of cereal. She returns and places the bowl before you, a massive basin you could use as a swimming pool, and pours in a nondescript O-shaped cereal, followed by a generous amount of milk. Fulda then plucks you up between her thumb and forefinger and carefully sets you on the rim of the bowl in front of her.

"Eat up, pet," she demands. "You'll need your strength for later." She pulls a heaping spoon of cereal out of the bowl and carries it over you, getting you soaked from two drops of milk. You shake your head no to her as she devours the spoonful.

"If you keep throwing my kindness back in my face today's only going to get worse for you, and it's not even 8 yet," she warns. "Now jump in the bowl and get your breakfast." She swirls her spoon around in the milk for a second then pulls it out again, piled higher than you are with the cereal. Fulda slides the spoon into her mouth and chews slowly, all while glaring down at you.

She lowers her face down so that you're eye to eye, allowing yourself to feel the totality of her presence. Her cold blue eyes bore holes into you, and she points at you with the spoon. "Last chance."
111111212111111121221111211111221.title: Irresistable Invitation

1111112121111111212211112111112211.content:
Faced with Fulda's menacing spoon, you turn around and jump in the bowl. The cold milk shocks you at first, but you're able to grab on to a floating bit of cereal and hold on.

Overhead Fulda's spoon slides into the bowl and scoops up another bite, leaving you completely unmolested. Tentatively you take a bite out of your life preserver while she chews, then freeze again as she sends the spoon back for more. She swirls it around, creating a weak whirlpool for you, but again makes no hostile move toward you.

You're still wary, but you shrug and decide to enjoy your breakfast. Last night you'd had to fight the giantess for food, and you didn't get nearly enough to eat. Fulda continues eating while you do, making no attempts to turn you into part of her breakfast.

After several minutes you finish eating the O the size of your torso and being treading milk. You look around and see that there aren't any others floating in the milk anymore either, so you turn towards Fulda. Her mouth was pulled tight in a bemused smile, and she was holding a silver spoon handle suspiciously close you with no sign of the basin.

Before you can process this information the basin emerges from the milk directly below you, picking you up with it. Liquid pours off the side as your body displaces it, and you turn to see Fulda looking at you, ready to pounce. However the spoon doesn't start racing toward her mouth so you lay still, not wanting to provoke the giantess.

A gigantic grin fills the sky, and an even larger hand descends upon you. Gingerly Fulda plucks you up between her thumb and forefinger, and she carries you over to a napkin. "There, see?" she asks. "I haven't tried to kill you once today! All you have to do is what I say." She gently dabs you with the napkin, taking a surprising amount of care not to harm you. "But I'm done eating now, I think it's time...
1111112121111111212211112111112211.title: Compliance Has Perks

11111121211111112122111121111122112.content:
A game? Fulda may have been somewhat less sadistic towards you this morning, but you have doubts that this is anything but a ruse in order to torment you. "Well, maybe not strictly a game," she continues, "but some sort of activity. It'll be fun, I promise!" She sets her hand palm up next to the table, and nods toward it.

You get up from the napkin and run towards her hand, understanding what she means. Your clothes are still soaked from milk, but hopefully they'll dry out soon. Fulda's "game" could be fatal if you tried to play it sopping wet.

As soon as you reach Fulda's hand and stand in the middle of her palm she pulls it up, letting her face loom over you. Her other hand appears before you, finger extended, and starts driving towards you. With nowhere to run you stay where you are and take the hit, the massive tree trunk of Fulda's finger knocking you onto your back. She giggles and says, "I still can't get over how small you are! I kind of hope you do keep shrinking."

"I'd rather not," you reply, getting back to your feet. Her finger is still where it was, letting you make out the whorls of her fingerprint.

"If I tell you to shrink, you'd better do it," she shoots back. Your world spins as she turns and heads back up the stairs. "I can't wait until that dollhouse is as big to you as my house was to you last night. Maybe I'll find another tiny person and put them in there with you..." The giantess trails off, apparently lost in thought until she reaches her room.

Upon arrival, she snaps her attention back to you. Slowly she crouches down, then lowers her hand to the ground. You're allowed to simply walk off, then Fulda shoots back up to her full height. If it weren't for the obvious threats interspersed with the kindness, you'd swear this is a different person today.

You look up to Fulda towering over you, hands clasped in front of her waist. "So, I have two ideas. Remember last night when you were climbing all over me trying to get your food? I had a lot of fun with that, and I think you did, too!"

"And the other one?"

"Well, it depends. Do you have your phone on you?"

"I should, yeah. I haven't called anyone because nobody would believe me, though."

"Okay, I don't care about that. I'm just curious what I look like from your point of view, you could take pictures of me from your little viewpoint and I could do a bunch of poses, hold you different ways, stuff like that, and then you could send them to me."

"Are you really letting me choose what we do?"

"Um, I guess? I'm going to have fun either way. Just choose quickly, or we'll play one of my other games that you probably won't like."

Well, this is interesting. You do really want to climb up this girl when she isn't trying to smash you flat, but you also want her to see what she's like to you so that maybe she'll realize how scary she is.
11111121211111112122111121111122112.title: Game Time

111111212111111121221111211111221122.content:
"I guess I could take pictures of you," you say, "but I don't have your number."

Fulda grins down at you. "Oh, you little idiot, I'll give you my number for this. Get ready." You pull out your phone and input the numbers as Fulda gives them to you. You send her a quick confirmation text, and get ready to begin.

"Hold on one sec," she instructs, and begins shifting some lamps around and fiddling with the lights. "I want to be sure you catch me in my best light." She continues adjusting the lamps, setting two beside you so that the light shines up on her, and stands back up.

"Start taking pictures, pet, I'll tell you when to stop. If I like how they turn out, there might even be a reward in it for you." You raise your phone to start taking pictures, and are somewhat awestruck by what you see. The light plays off her ankles, making them into two shining beacons twice as high as you are. Her legs appear as a pair of gleaming latte-colored pillars, massive implements of destruction that converge inside her skirt, her muscular thighs on full display beneath her miniskirt.

You snap several shots of her legs alone as you move up, the inclining angle allowing you to capture more of the giantess's beautiful body. Immediately she rectifies this though by bending over slightly, allowing you to see her face fixed in a stern mask, her thin lips pursed and her cold eyes narrowed.

Without warning she lifts up her foot and glides it over you, making you drop to the ground. "It's extra credit." Her solid calf pops out as she stands on her toes, her heels gradually lifting off the ground. She slams them back down a second later; fortunately you haven't moved, and remain uncrushed by the majesty before you.

What do you think?"

"You're letting me pick again?" you ask, somewhat confused.

"Just pick and stop questioning me, bug, or we'll do the one where I smash you early and it'll be for real!" she yells.
111111212111111121221111211111221122.title: A Model Giantess

Once you choose, Fulda calms down significantly. "Sounds dangerous," she remarks. "I like the way you think." She remains in this position, resting on her knees and poised to strike, her body forming an enormous wall that seemed hundreds of feet high. You continue backing away until you run into the wall. Fulda looks down at your tiny trapped self, a smug smile spreading in response to your confused look. "Chase is over, I caught you," she says, and lowers herself down to lay on the floor. Her massive face dominates your view, and you notice the smile on her red lips get even bigger. Out of the corner of your eye you see her hand creeping forward, all digits outstretched to ensnare you. You're a genuine shutterbug as her hand encroaches on you, up until you feel a tug on your shirt and you're lifted into the air.

Fulda carries you up to her face, beaming with happiness. "This giantess always catches her prey," she declares, effectively ending the chase. You make sure to photograph her as you dangle before her, hoping you effectively capture the threat implied by her huge mouth, or the predator's delight in her giant blue eyes.

"I've menaced you from on high, and cornered and pounced on you," she begins, "but I think we can do one more set. "I've got a couple ideas, but I think it'll be a real no-brainer." You remain silent, hanging from your shirt held between her fingers, waiting for her to tell you what they are.

"I can let you walk around on me and take pictures of just how small you are compared to even parts of my body," she starts, "or, and I really like this one, dangle you over my mouth and simulate eating you." She sees your expression and adds, "I'm not going to swallow you, dummy, you're holding the phone with all the pictures remember?" You decide not to question her this time and simply blurt out your choice.

11111121211111112122111121111122112211.content:
"Oh, that one?" Fulda says, disappointed. "Well, can't really say I'm surprised, who wouldn't want to get all over my body?" She stands momentarily, then plops herself down on her bed. You're shaken violently as she crashes into the mattress, but she's able to keep a firm grip on you with just her two fingers.

You land on her tight tummy covered by white fabric stretched thin and get your bearings. Behind you is her tiny miniskirt which barely even covers her immaculate legs which seem to stretch on for miles, and in front of you is an expansive white plain over firm ground which suddenly rises into two peaks.

Though you have a good starting location, you can think of a better place to begin. You turn around, walk over her skirt and out onto her thigh, then slide down into the space between her legs. Satisfied you clamber back up her smooth inner thigh and stride back onto her abs.

The ground under you vibrates as Fulda speaks. "Really? Upskirt pictures? If those don't make me look amazing you're going to pay for that you little deviant." You pay her threat no mind and continue advancing, marveling at the sheer size of this girl compared to you. It's difficult to convey through pictures, but as you proceed upwards it becomes clear that not only are her breasts several times larger than you, there's more than enough room for you in her cleavage.

You reach the foothills of her chest, and reach out to grab on and climb. Before you can get a firm grip the ground you're standing on suddenly shoots up as Fulda props herself up on her elbows, sending you tumbling down until you come to a stop on her skirt. "I think that's quite enough, perv," she announces. Her fingers descend and pluck you up once more, holding you more firmly than last time.
11111121211111112122111121111122112211.title: A Giantess Landscape

111111212111111121221111211111221122112.content:
Fulda reaches behind herself with her free hand and pulls out a laptop, then flips it open. She situates it on her stomach, then carefully sets you down beside the keyboard. The computer rumbles as she types in her password, then she looks down at you. "Okay pet, send me those pictures."

Dutifully you comply, and while you're doing so she plugs her own phone into the computer. "If you don't mind me asking," you begin, "why did you have me do that?"

"Last night after I put you to bed, I went online and searched for a few things," Fulda answers. "Tiny man, shrunken man, stuff like that, trying to figure out where the hell you came from. I didn't find any answers, but I did find a whole bunch of weird sites and forums of women acting like they were giantesses or threatening little bugs like you." She slides her thumb on the mouse pad and slams it down twice, opening the photos you sent her. "None of it was real though, they didn't actually have a tiny man with them." Again she pauses as she glances through the slideshow of photos. "I do, though. You're going to be my ticket to internet fame as the only real giantess."

"No one will believe you," you answer. "Even if they do, you're holding me captive. Someone will come and get me sooner or later."

"Look at you, thinking that actually matters." Fulda chuckles and gently pokes you with her finger, knocking you to your back. "Your stupidity would almost be adorable if you weren't- hey, these are actually pretty good for phone quality. Anyway, there's a lot more content I can add if they don't believe me."

"But someone will come," you insist.

"Nonsense! You're here of your own free will! Or are you saying you want to try to run away from me?"

"Well... no," you admit, if only because you knew trying to escape was certain death at this point. "It's just that you keep calling me 'bug,' like you don't see me as a person."

"Am I still doing that?" Fulda asks, lightly stroking your entire torso with the tip of her finger. "You're more of a pet now."

"That still-"

"Man, I'm gigantic compared to you!" she interrupts. You glance up, and see she's looking at the picture of you between her legs. "I'm not even mad about that anymore! Just from these few it's clear I could crush you even by accident! Now I understand why you didn't want to do the swallowing thing."

"I still don't like you calling me-"

"Pet, that was some good work. I'm happy, and you get a reward for making me feel so powerful compared to you. We can either watch the comments come rolling in praising your work, or I guess we could watch a movie."

Wait, a real reward besides letting you live? This is definitely unexpected. Still, you better not keep the temperamental giantess waiting.
111111212111111121221111211111221122112.title: Fulda's Pet

choices: You wake up in the popcorn bag

You go tumbling over the side onto her blanket and get bounced up momentarily when she stands, returning the mattress to it's neutral state. She casually strolls out, leaving the door wide open behind her. Briefly you consider making a run for it, but push the idea out of your head - it's not like you could get out of the house, and she would find you sooner or later.

Fulda returns a few minutes later holding a bag of popcorn and slams the door behind her. She approaches the bed and peers down, quickly spotting you where she left you. "Didn't even try to get off the bed," she notes. "If you keep this up I might start letting you out of my room." She hops up and slams herself onto the mattress, her butt landing just inches away from you. The force throws you into the air and launches you into Fulda's lap.

As the movie plays you break off bits of the kernel and eat them, just like you were at a regular movie. You notice that Fulda's rhythmic breathing steadily raises you up and then lowers you again, gently rocking you back and forth. The steady rhythm, combined with the firm support and warmth from her stomach, make your eyelids heavy. Try as you might to stay awake you eventually drift off to sleep.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Giantess Movie Theater

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
You're jolted back awake by a deafening thud when Fulda flicks her stomach. You roll over onto your front, and that's when you notice something isn't right. Before the movie you had been nestled comfortably atop her navel, but now you were practically inside it. Fulda looked way more massive to you now, too, and the distance up to her breasts was about twice as much as it had been before. Crap, you shrank again!

"Wake up, sleepyhead!" Fulda implores. "You must have really liked the movie, since you shrank too!" She already noticed! "You're, like, half the size you were before, so I guess you're an inch now. It was so cool watching you get smaller, too!" She steeples her fingers above you, making you feel like you're in a huge fleshy cathedral. "I'd like to be able to see that whenever I want to."

You remain silent, expecting her to just keep thinking out loud. The vibrations from her diaphragm as she speaks are making you feel strangely satisfied anyway, and you're fine just letting her talk. "What part of the school did you shrink in, anyway?"

"Why?" you ask, hoping to get her to speak some more.

"At home, actually."

"We should go to your house, then, and look around, since it was probably something there that caused it. Maybe there's some powder someone put in the food, or some sort of mold in your room, something like that. Might even be something supernatural, like a shrink ray or someone put a curse on you making you shrink. Do you know anyone besides me who might want to shrink you, someone in your house?"

It takes you a second to realize that Fulda had stopped talking, and when you do you realize that the pleasurable vibrations from her speaking have left you slightly aroused. "Well, uh, my sister Megan maybe? She's a cheerleader like you," was all you could come up with.

"Excellent!" Fulda exclaims. "She only lives a few houses down from me, and I can think of a reason to go over there and look around!" Her hand excitedly descends upon you, plucking you off of her stomach and moving you so that she dangles you over her face. "It's a good thing I found you and not her, though. She would've squandered the whole thing."

Fulda swings her legs over the bedside and stands, throwing your dangling body into a whirlwind of forces and motion. She's walking over to her phone when she idly asks you, "But if you shrank at home, what were you doing in the cheer team's locker room?"

You gulp. "Um, when I shrank I went to Megan for help, but she kicked me into her bag. Then she took me with her when she went to practice by accident."

Fulda's face suddenly gets a whole lot sterner. "And you just decided to crawl out and look up at all the giant cheerleaders that you were coincidentally in a room with while they were getting dressed?" You remain silent, not wanting to answer her leading question wrong. No doubt she had already made up her mind anyway.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: A Smaller Situation
