Each time before you scurry out from behind one you peer around the corner, making sure you're not being watched. You'd make quicker progress if you didn't sink nearly up to your waist in the carpet fibers, but by exercising due caution you're able to avoid being spotted.

You peer around one particularly large box, this one for a pair of mid-shin stiletto-heel boots, and realize it's the last one. Slowly you edge your way along it until you get to the gaping exit for your cave and survey the ground between yourself and the dollhouse. There's about ten feet of open carpet between the bed and door, making it look like about two and a half football fields to your goal. In the middle Fulda patrolled back and forth, her omnipresent gaze shifting between the bed and area between the bed and dresser, and occasionally towards the door. To your left it's about a hundred yards to the wall, and then you can shimmy behind the nightstand for cover, though occasionally Fulda looks just past that as well.

"Halfway, bug!" she announces. "I can't step on you anymore... on purpose, but I can still make you wish I had!" That means you only have two and a half minutes left. No matter what, it's going to be close.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Bed Cave

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
A quick calculation tells you that even running your hardest on open ground it would take you about a minute to reach the dollhouse. It would take you even longer over bad terrain, and there's no way Fulda wouldn't see you at some point - you may be small, but believe it or not you're not that small.

You sprint along the bed, staying in the shadows to somewhat conceal your movements. Your feet dig into the carpet which acts somewhat like mud as you go, slowing your run significantly, but you still reach the wall fairly quickly. From there you turn and slide behind the nightstand, unsure of what lies inside there but thankful you got this far without being spotted.

Once in the crevice the dust particles nearly choke you. At normal size you'd have just sneezed them out, but now that you're an inch tall they make you gag. Fortunately it's only a short distance to the other side, but until you reach it you're concerned you'll suffocate on dust and Fulda would think you ran away.

Wait, Fulda would think? you ponder to yourself as you sneak along the wall. Why should I care about hurting her feelings? She's the one who's keeping me here! Before you can get too lost in your thoughts the enormous Converse in front of you turn around, allowing Fulda to face you. Quickly you collapse yourself into a ball and slink into a small divot in the wall, hoping to stay hidden. You look up through spread fingers to see her watchful blue eyes pass right over your location.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Stealth Mission

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Fulda's eyes pass over you, giving no indication that she spotted you hiding in the nook. You wait for her to turn back around then you continue along your path, pressing yourself against the wall like sneaky people do in the movies. It takes a bit of shuffling, but you're soon entirely behind the giantess.

"Thirty seconds bug, better hurry!" Fulda announces as you start sprinting towards the dollhouse. You're completely in the open now: if Fulda so much as looks down and behind her, you'll be caught. You push the thought out of your head and keep running, trying to somehow ignore the giantess to your right.

Your dash takes you right to the dollhouse's front door and directly behind Fulda, who was standing only a few inches in front of it. You gaze up from the shadow of the giantess, following her ankles up her lithe legs and past her perfectly round butt all the way up to her dark red ponytail swishing side to side as she patrols the ground in front of her.

You're about to go into the house when the giant girl bellows, "You've got five seconds, pest, if I don't see you before then you're AWOL." She starts counting down, and you glance between the door and her legs. You definitely heard her say you had to get to the house, but now she has to see you before the time limit's up? Whatever you choose it's probably a trick, but you have to choose it fast.

When she hits three, you make your choice.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Stealing Home

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
With time running out you run down the dollhouse's front steps and toward Fulda's nearest leg. When she hits two you're halfway between them, exhausted from all the running you've had to do to get here but able to push on thanks to pumping adrenaline. Each step takes you half an inch closer, and hopefully towards allaying Fulda's wrath.

She hits one just as you grab onto the lip of her shoe. You hoist yourself up and latch on to her ankle, doing anything you can to get her to feel you as soon as possible: hitting, poking, tickling, even humping her leg. You're lifted into the air as she raises her leg behind her until she's holding it totally horizontal. With a glance up you see she's looking back down at you, grinning.

"Oh, there you are, bug!" she exclaims, swinging her leg back down so that it slams into the carpet. You lose your grip and fall off, landing in a crouch. "I was worried I was going to have to go looking for you. You're really good at being a bug!" Fulda pivots, swinging her boat-sized Converse over your head to slam it down next to you. She moves her other foot up and places her heels together, positioning it so that her shoes box you in. Gradually she bends over and places her hands on her hips, glaring down at you. The giantess was doing her best to make you feel small and insignificant compared to her. "Do you feel like a bug?"

"Um, well," you stammer, "kind of? I mean it's kind of hard not to when you could crush me and not even know it, really. Plus I get the feeling that if we were outside you'd be trying to burn me with a magnifying glass."

Fulda smirks at that. "Thanks for the idea." Her hand reaches down and plucks you up by your shirt with two fingers, then she lifts you up to hold you in front of her eyes. "For that, and for admitting that you're a bug I could crush whenever I want, I'm upgrading you back to pet. People keep bugs as pets right? I see grasshoppers in the pet store all the time."

You decide not to tell her what they're actually for. "Uh, sure, thanks." Just then your stomach rumbles. "Hey Fulda, I don't suppose we could eat now, could we?" you ask.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: In the Nick of Time

choices: Fulda's twisting it up for herself
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
"Eh, I guess," she answers. "It's about time for dinner anyway." She licks her lips playfully at you, then turns and heads out the door. While she descends the stairs she holds you in front of her magnificent face as if considering what to do with you now. You feel somewhat uneasy to have the girl's full attention, but at least she isn't angry at you anymore.

Once downstairs she goes to the kitchen and drops you on one of the linen place mats. You watch as she opens the refrigerator and pulls out a box of leftover spaghetti, then heaps it onto a plate you could land a helicopter on. She pops it into the microwave and walks back over to you, leaning on the table so that her body blocks out the light fixture.

"Where's my plate?" you ask, having only seen her make that enormous plate of food for herself.

"I don't have any food bowls for pets," Fulda replies, "especially not ones who could be food themselves. You'll have to eat off my plate." You gulp deeply upon hearing that.

Before you can formulate a response the microwave's timer goes off, and Fulda spins around to get her food out. She sets the plate down beside you, a massive ceramic disc with an edge just a bit higher than you are tall. Fulda looks down at you as she swirls her enormous fork in the noodles.

"Same rules as last night, pet," she says. "Eat what you can before I'm done. If you get caught up in what I'm about to eat you had better get free before it goes in my mouth, because I'm not stopping." You grab the plate's edge and hoist yourself up on it. Before you is a mountain of spaghetti and sauce, the noodles all knotted up and intertwined. Already rather hungry, you head towards a noodle and begin pulling on it so that you can start nibbling on it.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Dinnertable

choices: What can a few bites hurt?
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
The noodle's tip comes out of the pile easily, and you hold it in front of you with both hands. You wrap both arms around what you managed to get free and give the slippery spaghetti a tug, managing to pull more of it loose for your consumption. Satisfied with your two inches of pasta you start chowing down, trying to satiate yourself before the giantess comes for your share.

Meanwhile Fulda lifts her fork from the plate, loaded with more food than you could eat in a week. She slides the fork into her mouth and pulls it back out totally empty. You watch her chewing, her jaw moving up and down as she breaks up way more matter than you have in only a few seconds. Her throat bulges as she swallows then her eyes return to her plate, looking only at her food and not at you.

You continue munching on what you have, trying not to think about how easily you could wind up on that fork. Despite this you can't help but look up at her as she regularly consumes bites several times larger than you are and marvel at her sheer size. There's a close call when the noodle you're holding gets pulled into her fork, but luckily you were only holding the end. That's enough for you to decide that you're done.

Fulda reaches the same decision after that bite, but you notice it's only because the only thing left on the plate is you. Gingerly she wipes her mouth with a napkin and looks at you for the first time since she started eating. "Got any room left in that tiny belly of yours?" she asks. "I'm going to have pudding for dessert."
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Eating Fulda's Dinner

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
With a nod you answer, "I haven't had anything sweet since I shrank, some pudding would be amazing."

Fulda scoffs. "I wasn't asking you, I was going to have some regardless." She pushes herself up from the table and goes back to the refrigerator. Seconds later she returns with a swimming pool-sized bowl with chocolate pudding quivering inside it and a single spoon. When she sets it down it jiggles, and you cautiously approach the humongous bowl.

The giantess dips her spoon into the bowl and pulls out a heaping helping of pudding, then lifts it up to her mouth. Her lips part and she slides it in, then pulls it back out totally clean. You watch her not chew at all, and instead simply swallow as the dessert slides down her throat.

"Hey, could you hold your spoon down here so I can get a couple bites?" you ask, desperate not to climb into the bowl.

"I might," she answers coyly, "but you just said I haven't been sweet to you at all. I've given you food and a place to sleep, pet." She holds her hand over your head, palm down. "I should crush you for being so ungrateful." Fulda rears her hand back and you crouch, trying to cover your head.

"Wait, no!" you cry out. "I'm sorry Fulda, please don't smash me!" After a second of nothing turning you into pulp you remove your hands from your head and look up. Fulda's put her hand away and is looking down at you with a legitimately happy smile.

"You're pathetic, you know that right?" she says, continuing to grin. A spoon-shaped shadow falls over you as Fulda lowers a pudding-laden load down to your level. "Go ahead, have a couple bites. Just remember I didn't smash you when I could have."

You decide to take advantage of it before she changes her mind. Bodily you dive into the pudding spoon, gnashing away at the tasty treat to get what you can before Fulda decides it's enough. After a few seconds she begins lifting the food away from the table and toward her mouth.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Fulda's Dessert

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
The spoon lifts off the table, taking you with it. You try to push yourself out, but no matter what you can't break away from the pudding. In fact, the harder you push the more it sucks you in, making it even harder for you to get out! Fulda pauses the spoon's movement and you start kicking your legs furiously, trying to signal her that you're stuck.

She definitely sees your signal, but her first reaction is to laugh. "Sorry, but you knew the rules, and you should already know to never get between a girl and her chocolate." You feel the spoon moving forward again, and Fulda's voice gets louder as you get closer. "Besides, I've already been plenty merciful today." In desperation you try shouting for help, but the pudding muffles your shouts too well for anything to escape. Another try is impossible, since the only thing left for you to breathe is pudding.

The suffocation doesn't last much longer as the pudding slides off you a second later. You gasp for air, not fully grasping what the complete darkness around you meant until the floor above you rises up. Fulda's tongue lifts and throws you back to her gullet, and you're forced down her throat along with the pudding. For a minute you hope against hope, but admit that there's no chance of her forcing you back up.

A resonating "Mmm," fills the air around you as you resign yourself to being part of her dessert.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Becoming Fulda's Dessert

choices: She tells you to climb her
You need to get cleaned up
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
As Fulda lifts the spoon away you feel your legs leave the table. With a strong push you force yourself back off the spoon and out of the pudding, landing on your back on the place mat. You clear the pudding from your eyes just in time to see Fulda shove the spoon into her mouth without even pausing to see if you were okay.

She lowers the spoon for another truckload but pauses in mid-air. Your ears are filled with a booming, unfamiliar sound as Fulda bursts into raucous laughter! "Oh man, look at you!" she shouts, "You're just covered in pudding!" She starts falling to the side, unable to control her laughter. "It's all over you!" Her hand reaches for you, fingers outstretched, and she says, "I should stick you in my mouth and suck that off you! Or just swallow you whole, it's mostly pudding anyway!" Fulda's hand slams down on the table in front of you; she's laughing too hard even to eat you!

It takes her a full minute to recover, at which point she tears a bit off a napkin and tosses it to you. "Go ahead and clean yourself up," she commands, still barely able to contain her laughter. She gets up, taking the half-eaten bowl with her. "I can't eat anymore after that. I doubt you can, too!" With another loud, staccato "Ha!" she puts it away and closes the door.

When she returns to the table you've mostly cleaned yourself off, and expectantly wait for Fulda to pluck you up again. Instead she takes a napkin and tosses it over you, then picks it up so that you're swept up inside it. While she walks back upstairs she swings it a couple times, throwing you against the paper and effectively cleaning the rest of the pudding from you.

Back upstairs she sets you down on the floor and opens the napkin. You're greeted by a loud thud some distance away, then an enormous, pure white socked foot sets down before you. You climb up onto the sock and walk up to her shin so that you can shout, "Hey Fulda! Are we going to do anything else?"

"I'm pretty tired, pet, aren't you?" she answers as she opens up her laptop.

"Kind of, but I want to do something before bed!" Beside you her other foot lifts up, presenting the bottom of her sock to you. It pauses, then begins racing down toward you, only to stop when it's practically hovering over your head. She moves it away and sets it back down where it was.

"I could do that and then go right to bed," she threatens. "But I don't want to do laundry just yet, so if it'll keep you from pestering me let's do something."
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Back to the Room

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
"Climb up my legs, I guess," she says, typing away at her computer. "But just the legs though, I don't have enough time for you go to all the way up me and you haven't been that good. Don't fall off though, or... hell, you can probably guess. Just get up here, and be quick about it."

You don't have to be told twice. Using the top of her ankle sock as a boost you push yourself up, grabbing onto the grooves in her skin as a handhold. Fulda clearly maintains her legs very well; there isn't a hair in sight, making your climb that much harder. You thrust your hand up to find another groove, wondering where she found the time to shave between tormenting and shrinking you.

After several minutes of sliding your body up her silky smooth legs you feel as though you may be nearing the top. You glance down and see the immense tower of her shin below you, her foot idly tapping away as if she's listening to some inaudible music. When you look back up you notice her laptop screen is no longer visible over her knees, meaning you should have an unimpeded run over her thighs. Once more you reach up, taking a handhold just below her kneecap, ready for your climb to be over.

"I just need to stretch out a bit," she announces, and you feel the shin you're grasping start to extend outward and upward, turning into a ramp. You look up Fulda's body, unable to believe your luck, and stand so that you can more quickly run up your new ramp.

Fulda looks down at you with a mischievous grin, and you suddenly wish you had stayed down. A shadow falls over you as Fulda's leg crosses over, and you feel the leg beneath you rotate as well. You go to ground and try to grab whatever handhold you can find in such a short time, holding on for dear life. When she stops you're dangling from her shin by one hand with nothing but carpet below you.

"That's much better!" she declares while you paw at the air trying to get your grip back. "You should hurry up though pet, my eyelids are getting heavy and I don't think you can even open your dollhouse anymore." Your fingers start to slip from your tenuous grip as you make one last grab.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Scaling Fulda

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Your arm whiffs through the air, your fingers just barely missing the crevice they were aiming for. Inevitably your other hand slips off her leg, sending you plummeting to the carpet below when you lose your grip. You don't even has time to scream as you fall, Fulda's immaculate legs getting farther away as you descend.

Fortunately the carpet cushions your landing. "Oh my, you fell," Fulda observes aloud. "Why did you have to do that? I told you not to. Pets shouldn't disobey their owners." Without even looking down at you Fulda lifts up her foot and holds it over you, the sock-covered instrument of destruction slowly descending towards you.

"No! Fulda, stop, I'm sorry!" you cry, unsure why you're apologizing but hoping to stay her foot.

"Oh, now my pet's trying to give me commands," she comments playfully. Her foot continues to get closer. "Maybe earlier I would've let you live, but now I can shrink anyone I want to." Fulda's foot is nearly on top of your head by this point. "Bet you wish you realized how expendable you are before you had all these discipline issues, huh?"

"Please don't crush m-!" You're interrupted by her socked foot landing on your body, not hard enough to crush you but enough to silence you through sheer size. You futilely push at it, trying to get it off of you as the pressure steadily builds. As she pushes harder you can't even resist anymore, her massive foot pinning both arms to the ground. Despite the unbearable pressure you continue squirming, trying to get free somehow.

Eventually it becomes too much. Fulda's foot continues to weigh heavier and heavier until you're crushed under it, becoming no more than a stain between her sock and the carpet.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Disobedience is not Tolerated

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
By the grace of fate your hand manages to catch onto Fulda, securing you against her shin. Little by little you slide your fingers over in the groove, trying to get back on top. When you reach the curve of her calf you swing your leg up over it, allowing yourself to clamber up the side. In practically no time at all you're standing atop Fulda's calf, looking up her thigh at her perky butt.

Luckily for you she was still providing a ramp. You run over the back of her knee, causing her to giggle and squirm as you tickle her. Your path continues up her thigh, then you hop onto her skirt and climb the hill onto her butt. You're about to keep running onto the small of her back when a massive hand descends from the sky and swipes you up, knocking you off your feet and plunging you into darkness.

When Fulda opens her fingers you're being held up to her eyes. The two massive blue orbs focus on you, then a voice booms from below you. "That good enough for you?" You nod, and she nods back. "Thought so. C'mon, it's time to sleep."

With a quick blur of motion you find yourself at the dollhouse's front door. Fulda tips her hand, allowing you to slide off her fingers and touch down on the hard plastic. She was right; the doors are massive to you now, having been designed for dolls four times your height, and despite pulling with both hands you can barely even crack it open. Seeing your difficulty Fulda extends a finger and pulls the door open with more ease than you might take off your shirt.

As soon as you step through the doorway Fulda slams it shut again, and an instant later you hear a loud crash as something is jammed in front of the door. Sighing you ascend the stairs, taking them one at a time as you have to swing your leg over each one, and walk over to your new bed. Again you sigh as you look up at it. Last night it was just the right size for you, but now you're able to look underneath it without even having to bend down. You grab onto the railing with both hands and brace your legs against the side of the headboard to pull yourself up atop the mattress.

Out the window you can see Fulda undressing. First the removes her skirt, revealing her white panties, then she pulls off her shirt allowing her breasts to bounce in their yellow bra. She pulls off each sock with the opposite foot and kicks them under the bed. Before you can see any more she turns off the light, covering the room in absolute darkness.

You pull the covers up to your chin, fully aware that you were sleeping in a severely too big bed designed for a doll, and close your eyes.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Put to Bed

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
When next you open your eyes you're greeted by darkness once more with the blanket's weight pressing down on your body. Crap, you think, it's happened again. You press your feet into the mattress and push yourself upwards several times to escape the cover, nervously waiting to see how small you've gotten this time. Upon emerging from the blanket you look around to get an estimate of your new size.

The bed you're in looks to be almost 30 feet long, and with a glance over the side you guess it's about 10 feet to the ground. Furniture which seemed usable when you were first in here could almost certainly serve as your new room all by itself. On the nightstand beside you is a lamp which, if it had any power, you would be lucky to be able to turn on while standing on your toes.

Your survey is interrupted when the house shakes from a violent strike. "Oh little pet!" Fulda calls out in a sing-song voice. "Come on out before I kick your house down, I want to see how small you are now!" At least she wouldn't be surprised. An enormous light blue eye appears in the window and focuses on you. "Ooh, you look really small now, almost miniscule."

You turn yourself over onto your stomach and slide your legs off the side, allowing yourself to hold onto the mattress as you get out of bed. When your body's wholly unfurled you move down to holding the bed's railing, then drop the rest of the way to the dollhouse's floor. Sheepishly you walk out onto the balcony and stand between the railing's supports, 20 foot high columns from your point of view.

Fulda stands up as you exit and places her hands on her hips, her posture serving as a reminder as to who's in charge. You look the giantess over and see she's wearing a pair of dark red hot pants that barely cover any more than her miniskirt did and a tight blue T-shirt. She lifts up her foot and holds it in front of you to compare sizes, letting you see it's the shiny black flat you landed on yesterday.

"Wow, I can barely see you down there!" she exclaims. "You're like a baby gnat. What are you, half an inch or something?" You shrug and she crouches down, letting her face hover over you. Intimidated you glance down at her feet and see the size-changing gun lying there. When you look back up you see her thumb and forefinger are upon you, and Fulda plucks you up like a gaming peg. "Hmm, half an inch if you're lucky. Watch out today; I don't want to grind you into dust before you earn it."

Your stomach falls as she stands up, raising you several hundred feet in a split second. "But before we can get to that, I just realized you haven't cleaned yourself at all. C'mon, I'll draw you a bath." Your world rocks back and forth as Fulda carries you to the bathroom and sets you on the counter, letting you marvel at the magnificent size of the faucet and soap, while she decides where to clean you.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Rise and Shrink

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Fulda reaches over you and pulls up on a rod, sinking the plug down into the drain. She turns the knobs and lets the water run over her hand so that she can get a feel for the temperature, pulling her hand back when she's satisfied. "Get undressed," she commands. You hesitate, so she adds, "What, are you worried about me seeing you naked?" You nod. "You've practically been inside my ass and you've spent way more time than you deserve inside my skirt and bra. Fair's fair, stop being a baby."

You blush deeply, but remove your clothes anyway. "Good," she comments. "Now get in the water." With a running start you cross onto the lip of the sink and jump, pulling your legs up into a cannonball. Your impact creates a splash that from your perspective is a monumental crash, but looks to barely be a blip to Fulda.

The giantess picks up a nearby bar of soap and pinches off a small corner, then drops the bit into the sink with you. "Get cleaned up, I'll go shrink some clothes for you." Fulda gets up and leaves, allowing you to clean yourself up in relative peace. You scrub yourself over with the sliver of soap in the lukewarm water as the sink continues to fill.

Your reprieve from the giantess doesn't last long as she returns when you're only halfway done. She sets a new set of clothes down by yours and turns off the water, then rests her chin on the sink's rim. Silently she watches you, her eyes sparkling with a playful vigor. "You're small," she says, a groundbreaking observation, then she continues, "I'm not." You do your best to ignore Fulda's commentary and finish cleaning yourself.

Just when you're finished, you look up and see her face looming above you, her lips merely half an inch from your head. "Do you know how many ways I could destroy you?" she asks. You decide not to answer, and soon realize you don't even have to. "For starters I could crush you with my hand, stomp on you, sit on you, throw you at the wall... hell right now I could just pull the drain and let you go down it, or suck you into my mouth and swallow without even chewing. That's how small you are and big I am." You start to get nervous when her hand dips into the sink and lifts you out, taking a bit of water out with you. "Remember that," she adds as she sets you down on a towel.

Quickly you dry off and put on the clothes Fulda brought you, a non-descript black T-shirt that's way too big for you and a pair of loose, somewhat dazzled jeans. "Hm, those are really tight on me," she says, "Guess I'll have to practice shrinking things for you."

"They're fine, and... thanks," you reply. You know the better way for her to get clothes that fit you would be to grow you back to normal size, but decide it's best not to tempt her wrath. "So, now what?"
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Bathtime

choices: Take your chances with her thighs
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
"I already showered, so it's time to eat," Fulda declares. She plucks you up again and lets you hang by your shirt as she walks through her room, allowing you to sway in a manner you don't think you'll ever get used to. "Yesterday was kind of boring, but I've thought up a game that should make it exciting for both of us."

"A game?" you echo. "Didn't your parents ever teach you not to play with your food?"

"That only applies if you're my food," she retorts. "Are you volunteering? Should I just pop you in my mouth now and go shrink someone else?"

"No," you groan, hoping she'll forget you even mentioned it.

"Good. If you just let me crush you it wouldn't be very fun for me now would it?"

Your banter was enough to distract you until she reached the kitchen. Instead of setting you down on the table as she passes like yesterday she holds onto you while she grabs her food, keeping it hidden from you by holding you down against her thigh. You look down, contemplating how far you'd fall if Fulda suddenly decided to let go. It seems unlikely you'd survive unless you could somehow slide down her leg, but the ramp off her calf would probably be fatal by itself.

You're jolted from contemplation when Fulda suddenly jerks you up and carries you over to the table. In a rush she holds you up before her eyes, positioning you so that you can only look at her. As you stare into one of her chilling eyes you feel yourself being lowered, and Fulda taunts, "I really hope you can figure out what to do here." With a glance down you see that she's lowering you onto the very edge of a pastry.

Fulda's fingers open, dropping you down onto the hard frosting. You can't be certain from this angle, but it looks like you're on the top of a pop tart the size of a football field! A rumble emanates from Fulda's throat as she moans, then says, "It's my favorite flavor, too, I'm going to eat every bit of this." Without further warning Fulda opens her mouth wide and she begins slowly raising your platform up to her maw.

It's not like she could make it any more obvious what she's doing, so you turn and run the other way, hopping over sprinkles rising out of the frosting. Just behind you Fulda's teeth sink into the pastry, and you glance back to see her two enormous front teeth bared as she tears her sizable bite away. Unsure of how much longer you have before she bites again, you simply turn forward and run.

Everything spins suddenly, throwing you down on your chest and causing you to roll forward towards the edge. Before you looms Fulda's mouth, wide open and ready to strike. You scoot backwards as best you can as Fulda bites down again, casting you in the shadow of her rapidly approaching upper lip.

Fulda's teeth penetrate the pop tart so close they nearly tear off your toes, leaving her lip to hang over you. She puckers her lips, a simple movement to get food into her mouth but an overwhelming force that brushes you off the surface. Thankfully you're able to grab on to the side rather than fall into her bottom lip, but it may not be a victory for long. You watch Fulda quickly chew and swallow her bite then turn her attention back to the pastry before you can even swing yourself back on top. With a glance below you see the large landing pad of Fulda's thighs directly below you, though she may not appreciate you trying to stop her game early.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Pop Tart Trap

choices: She pops you in before you can
You close your eyes and step off
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
With a surge of energy you pull yourself back on top of the pop tart, crumbs falling away as your muscles strain to get you over the edge. Once on your feet you start running back the way you came, hoping you'll be able to outpace her ravenous maw. The pastry shudders as Fulda nips at it, her bite carefully calculated to just miss you.

You decide to make your way to the edge since Fulda seems to be focusing on the middle. Swiftly you head for the side hoping to find some refuge there, but as you approach she angles her head so that it directly faces you. Before you can take a step back she opens wide and bites off another chunk, her teeth coming so close that you could give them a flossing.

In a panic you go to the other side, but Fulda is much faster than you. Before you can even get halfway there she's already waiting, licking her lips in anticipation. You take another step and she pounces, her cavernous mouth encompassing all of the ground in front of you. She bites off this segment, sending you backpedaling away from her lips.

In a short amount of time the giantess has reduced this mammoth pop tart to a single broad strip with you standing on one side and her hungrily eying the other half. Menacingly she opens her mouth and begins slowly moving towards the half you're not on, gingerly sliding her mouth around it. With a sudden bite she clamps her teeth down, severing the remainder in twain and leaving you with a small, bite-sized bit to stand on.

Fulda purposefully chews, then makes a show of swallowing her bite. "Looks like I win," she declares as she moves the morsel you're on toward her mouth. You look down and see you're directly over her legs, one crossed over the other. When you glance back you're looking inside her wide open mouth, her tongue eagerly awaiting you to be deposited upon it. If you're going to do something now would be the time.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Menacing Mouth

choices: She begins prodding at you curiously with her tongue
She decides to head back to sleep...
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
You stare down fearfully at the drop, wondering if you could survive it. Even if you did she'd probably still eat you... But as you look at her maw slowly moving towards you, you cant help but feel that falling to your death would be a better fate. So you close your eyes and prepare to jump... However the time it took you to think this over was to long and your world shakes as she gently sets the chunk of poptart onto her tongue. Before you can do anything else about it she pulls her tongue along with you inside her mouth.

Huge pink fleshy walls surround you and the poptart shakes as her tongue figets. Everything fades into a horrifying half light as she closes her lips almost entirely leaving only a conveniently sized opening. You understand the game she's playing, its all about making a mad dash to the opening before she swallows you or closes them. So without any further wait you charge the opening hoping the direct strategy will work. You climb over her teeth and dive towards her glossy lips only to have them close entirely sealing you in darkness. A chuckle eminates from the back of her throat and she gulps loudly sucking you backwards. But by some stroke of luck you get caught between her front teeth. You pray she doesn't notice you...

"Goodbye, little bug." She says, her voice booming. She didn't know you were still in her mouth. This was far better than anything you could have hoped for. However things were about to get a lot worse or better for in a instant...
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Enter the maw.

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Thinking you're in the clear, you exhale deeply and begin to relax a little as you slowly try to work yourself out from between those gigantic teeth. You are suddenly pressed flat against the teeth by something large and wet. It eases off of you and you realise it was Fulda's tongue. Her voice booms around you.

"HEY, I WON THE GAME! WHAT DO YOU THINK YOU'RE DOING IN THERE?"

Panic stricken, you struggled furiously to free yourself before she did. Her tongue came in again, this time exerting enough force and precision to knock you free. As you slid down onto her gums, you had to think fast. Fulda didn't give a chance as a torrent of saliva swept you away, carrying you to the centre of her massive tongue.You stared helplessly into the gaping abyss of her throat as you were washed into her gullet with a powerful gulp, swallowed along with the rest of the pop tart.

Descending through Fulda's esophagus was absolutely surreal. Surrounded by the biological cacophony of her innards, you could make out her thunderous heartbeat as you traveled through her chest cavity.

Eventually you wound up in her colossal stomach, landing in a mushy pile of pop tart goo. Peeling yourself away from the remains of the pop tart, you looked around the enormous cavern of her stomach. "She really ate me..." you say to yourself, staring around the inside of her belly in disbelief, the gurgling gastric juices swirling around slowly and working on your pop tart island. The stomach rumbles all around you as...
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Fulda's Belly

choices: Something happens in the gastric fluid... but what?
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
The pop tart you are on won’t last long you think to you self, as Fulda’s fluids eat away at the tart. Apparently Fulda wasn’t done with her pop tart snack as you hear another’s crinkly wrapper being savagely ripped open through the pink walls of her stomach. “Uh-oh” you say to your self. Just as more pop tart chunks fall into the liquid that could spell your doom. “What kinda savage doesn’t cook the-” you begin saying as a chunk smashed into your already weakened pop tart life raft, causing you to fly off into the liquid below.

Do you manage to climb onto another or...?
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: More pop tarts

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
With nowhere else to go you take a leap of faith. You step over the edge, your body sliding between Fulda's fingers, and gravity pulls you down. An instant later you land just above her knee and force your eyes open, letting you see the incline you're about to slide down.

Slide may not be the right word, you realize, as your body tumbles end over end down the length of her thigh. The smooth skin provides no impediment or handholds to catch yourself, leaving you entirely at the mercy of gravity while you fall down the tanned slope.

Abruptly the ground beneath you changes to dark red fabric, and you dig your fingers into the cotton to stop yourself. You manage to snag the bottom opening of her shorts, keeping you from falling any further and leaving yourself out in the open. At the very least, you think, Fulda can't lose track of you here.

You look up her towering torso and see that she's staring directly at you, having never lost sight of you at all, still holding the little bit of her breakfast. Her eyes widen momentarily as she tosses it in her mouth, then she begins slowly chewing the morsel, all while looking down at you as if she's sending a message. Finally she swallows, and you watch the lump forced down her throat with trepidation. As much as you hate to admit it you're out of options here, and the next move is totally up to Fulda.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: The Descent

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
The giantess licks her lips and lets out a satisfied moan, all while keeping you fixed in her predator's gaze. You're unsurprised to see her hand coming down, fingers extended, to pick you up. With no chance to escape you simply allow her to grab you, her enormous finger and thumb engulfing everything from your armpits to your knees. You try vainly to hold on to her shorts, but as soon as Fulda lifts you up your hands are wrenched away.

Slowly she raises you up her body, letting you get an extra good look at her massive chest as you go by. When she gets you in front of her face she raises up her other hand and holds it flat, then sets you atop it. "Did you have fun, pet?" she asks, grinning playfully. "I had a blast. If you weren't such a poor sport about the whole thing I'd give you another shot."

"Imagine that, I'm a poor sport about you eating me," you reply sarcastically. Fulda's expression visibly darkens.

"Don't talk like that to me, bug," she orders. "You seem to keep forgetting how small and expendable you are. Do I have to remind you?"

You hang your head. "No, I'm sorry. It won't happen again." Fulda considers your response, trying to decide if she should accept your apology.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Plucked Up

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
"Good. Just don't do it again or I'll smash you flat, got me?" You nod in agreement, and Fulda smiles again. "I would just be heartbroken if you made me crush you... for about two minutes until I found someone else to shrink."

"Why not just not shrink someone else?" you ask, hoping she doesn't think you're being too insolent.

Fulda laughs. "That's a dumb question! Your brain shrinking must have made you an idiot." She playfully pokes you with a fingertip as big as your whole upper body, knocking you down in her palm. "Because then I'd be bored, duh." The giantess leaves her fingertip on top of you, pinning you down. "Besides, I love being tall. Not just for the sake of it, but being taller than other people. Like, there's this one guy at school who's barely five feet tall. I just love towering over him. Sometimes I just stand in front of him and look down, then laugh when he has to look all the way up at me.

"Shrinking someone else down is kind of like that, but way more intense. I'm so much taller than you, and I'm in control of absolutely everything, even your height. When you eat, what you do, where you live, even whether you sleep are all up to me. Your life is literally in my hands." She beings pressing with her finger, putting more pressure on you. "If I pushed just a little bit harder I would crush you right now. It would take like no effort for me to absolutely destroy you. I'm not giving up this kind of power."

You swallow hard, then Fulda removes her finger from on top of you. "It's really hard for me to not go out and shrink, like, ten people, and tower over all of them at once, then step on them one by one. But not doing that means I get to spend a lot of quality time with you. Aren't you glad you get to spend time with me?" You nod, and Fulda smiles again. "Now let's go have some fun."

Fulda's fingers curl inward and you're thrown into darkness as she makes a loose fist around you. The ride is short but just as disorienting as always, since you're bounced around inside her fist. When her fingers open again you're back in her room and falling down onto her mattress. She stays there for a moment, looking down and idly swirling her finger around you, trying to decide what to do next.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Giant Forgiveness

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
"I think we should..." Fulda begins, but her phone ringing interrupts her. "One sec, pet." She reaches over to the nightstand and picks up her phone, then answers it. "Hello? Oh hey Anni! Nothing much, just hanging around the house. I was thinking about watching a movie later. Mhmm. Who else is going? When are you leaving? I guess, yeah, sure. All right, I'll see you in fifteen! Bye!" She hangs up and tosses the phone onto the bed next to you.

Fulda kneels down on the floor, placing her face directly above you. She looks at you with her blue eyes lit up and excitedly asks, "Guess where we're going today, pipsqueak? The mall!" You audibly groan, causing her to furrow her eyebrows at you. "You should be more excited, this is the first time you've gone out since shrinking. And you'll get to see all my pretty friends, and we're going to try on lingerie, and I might even get a new friend for you!"

"You're going to show me to people?" you ask in disbelief. "I'm not sure that's wise."

"I said see, not meet," Fulda corrects. "If I showed you off to them they'd all want their own, or maybe they'd want to borrow you. If you think I'm mean you'd be begging to be with me again after five minutes with Lisa, I watched her pull all the legs off a bug once and grin the whole time. I'd be surprised if she didn't stomp on you immediately when she saw you."

"And you're taking me out with these lunatics?"

"I can't very well leave you here alone! I'm sure you'd get lonely by yourself, and you'd start walking around and I wouldn't see you when I got back and oops." She fakes a scared and surprised look and covers her mouth. "Crunch. All because you wanted some time alone. Is that what you want? You want me to step on you?" You shake your head in response, and she grins.

"Now. We have fifteen minutes, and I want to play a game to pass the time."
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Big Plans

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
"I know just the thing!" she exclaims, then snatches you up without further explanation. The ride is unusually bumpy due to her excitement, but from the lack of loud crashes you can tell she doesn't go downstairs. In only a few seconds you're exposed to open air again, rolling down Fulda's fingers and out onto the ground.

You push yourself to your feet and look around, expecting to see some horrible environment Fulda created just for you. Instead of that, however, you notice you're standing on... a street? Everything around you is proportioned almost perfectly for someone your size, including the meticulously detailed trees and cars. The only thing that doesn't fit the scale here is Fulda: the tallest building barely makes it past her ankle.

With confusion you look up at Fulda, who stands astride the whole street you're on with her impossibly long, tanned legs. She looks down at you and explains, "My dad goes through these weird phases where he gets really into something for a bit and then drops it, a few years ago it was model trains. He's pretty much abandoned it, but keeps the set around. For a while he's been meaning to throw it out... so he shouldn't mind if I mess it up a bit." To emphasize her point she lifts up her foot and stomps down on the model house next to you, her shoe utterly shattering the roof and knocking down all the walls.

Terrified, you run down the street away from her, only to be stopped when she crushes a car in front of you with her other foot. You freeze and look up at her, and see that from the look on her face she's practically intoxicated with power. "So what's it gonna be, bug?" she bellows down. "You gonna stop the big, mean giantess destroying your city, or are you going to hide and run away?"
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Girlzilla

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Surprisingly you find it inside yourself to fight back against Fulda. Maybe you're certain that she won't crush you over this game, or the opposite and you're sure she won't stop until you've been crushed beneath her shoe, it's unclear; the only thing you're sure of is that it's time to take the fight to Fulda for once.

Your eyes follow the contours of her toned calf hovering above you, and you begin to wonder just how you'll be able to hurt this behemoth. As you watch she raises up her other foot and coils her knee to her chest, then stomps her foot down on top of a house. The house she stomps explodes from the force, the shockwave throwing shrapnel nearly a foot in the air and knocking you to your back. Clearly damaging her from the ground would be a challenge.

While you lay on your back she bends down, letting her red-shorted rear dangle over your head momentarily. Quickly she stands back up, accompanied by an awful ripping sound as she tears one of the foam board houses off its foundation. She turns around, barely missing you with her enormous shoes, and holds the house in front of her. With one simple motion she slams it into her abs, breaking it into its component pieces, and lets them rain down around you.

Idly she twitches her foot, showing no sign she knows you're directly below her. From her blind spot you might be able to get on her without her noticing and do some damage somehow. Alternatively there's probably something out in the town that would give you better chances, be it a bit of string or a needle, or maybe even one of these cars works.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Tiny Against Giantess

choices: You're in the clear for now
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
You make up your mind: you're going to climb Fulda and damage her in a way that will hopefully present itself when you're in a better position. Steeling yourself you run up to Fulda's heel while she's still facing away from you and look up and up, craning your neck back just to see the top of Fulda's shiny shoe towering over you. The sheer surface itself would present a challenge, you realize, as the back of her shoe is six times taller than you alone.

On the other side of the street Fulda drags her foot backwards along the ground, smashing model houses, plastic trees and toy cars alike as she scatters them in her foot's wake. When it's gone back as far as it can she lifts it up and swings it across the street, ramming it into a row of houses. The first one is utterly annihilated, breaking into thousands of pieces as soon as she makes contact. Thankfully you're shielded from the debris by her towering leg, and are able to see the second one get launched into the wall. At the third house she demolishes the facade with the toe of her shoe, but her foot gets stuck in it up to her ankle.

"I hope you weren't hiding in any of those, pipsqueak," Fulda booms from high above. "I would really hate to have smashed you without being able to hear you beg for your life." You realize this might be your best chance to get on her, and run along the outside of her shoe while her attention's turned elsewhere. When you reach the lowest point you raise your arms as high as they can go, stand on your toes, and give as much of a hop as you can. Luckily your fingers are able to get a grip on the top of her shoe, and with some frantic kicking you're able to get on top of her shoe.

With a glance forward you see that she's nearly gotten her foot free from the house she buried it ankle-deep into, and you know your time is limited. You turn and run up her shoe towards Fulda's enormous leg, hoping that as you get higher you'll get more steps to this plan. It's not too long, though, until you've run out of shoe and begin running across her bare skin. Your feet sink into Fulda's soft, warm flesh as you dash across the surface, providing you perfect traction on your way to her ankle.

Just as you reach her ankle and begin considering a way up, the ground beneath you shudders and a gigantic leg swings across the sky. Fulda had gotten her foot free, and was going to resume her trail of destruction on this miniscule town hunting for you. That is, unless she already feels you.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: The Direct Approach

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Before you can do anything, you feel the foot you're standing on start lifting up backwards. Thinking fast you grab onto her ankle as well as you can, trying to resist the slide down the steep incline. Fulda tilts her foot so that it points downward until it's entirely vertical, leaving you hanging by your incredibly loose grip. With a very slight movement she lightly taps her toe on the ground, shaking you off her ankle and sending you down to the plywood street below.

Fulda stands astride the street, her mountainous legs forming an arch over your prone body. You gaze up at her massive form, contemplating just how long it would have taken to climb up her leg: with how miniscule you are, they're probably a hundred times taller than you by themselves. As you consider this Fulda bends slightly to look down at you, her eyes just barely peeking over her breasts.

"Really, twerp?" Fulda asks mockingly. "You were going to climb me? What were you gonna do, be small at me until I stopped?" She laughs at her joke, then fixes you with a deathly serious stare. "The game's not over, start running." To encourage you she lifts up her foot, motivating you to get back to your feet and start running away. Just in time too, since her foot crashes to the ground exactly where you had been.

You start off running to the left, hoping to duck into one of the houses and get out of her sight for a few moments at least. Just as you yank the door open and are about to rush in, however, the air fills with a cacophony as the house is instantly demolished when Fulda steps on it, her shoe missing you by mere inches. Quickly you take cover from the debris, but Fulda begins grinding her foot along the ground towards you, shepherding you back into the street.

Next you try going to the right, hoping to run beneath some plastic trees and duck into some alleyways to escape her. Just as you get past the first tree however Fulda's foot soars overhead, clipping the tree and sending it teetering towards you. She slams her foot down at the far end of the alley, blocking off your escape.

Desperately you run back out into the street, hoping to find something to help you get away. Instead you run face first into Fulda's shoe, knocking you back to the ground. The giantess can't help but let out a booming laugh as she watches your tiny form go prone again.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Tiny in Trouble

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
You don't wait to see what Fulda's going to do to you now. Instead you spring back up to your feet and start running away from her, hoping to put enough distance between you and her that she'll have trouble hitting you in the landscape. When a shadow falls over you, it merely takes a glance to confirm that it's Fulda's foot poised to strike.

Desperately you leap forward , throwing yourself into the air just as she slams her foot down. Luckily you're not on the ground when her shoe lands with meteoric force, and with a quick roll you're back on your feet. Before you can celebrate a loud crash to your right draws your attention, and a model house explodes as Fulda's foot shoots through it.

You throw yourself to the ground, avoiding the wreckage as it flies through the air. Dust rises from the demolition, clouding your vision from the ground. When it starts to clear a moment later you see the distinct outline of Fulda's shoe racing down towards you. Deftly you roll to the side, just clearing her insole as it crashes down beside you.

Desperately you get up again, running in whichever direction forward is now. Just when you think you're making good progress you trip on some wreckage and fall flat on your face. You stumble forward then fall again, this time landing on your back. Frantically you scoot backwards, praying that the remaining dust cloud provides you with some cover.

Your back bumps into a wall, and in front of you the cloud has mostly settled. Looking to your left you find yourself pinned against steps leading up to a house. The path to your right is clear, until a mammoth shoe sets down beside you, blocking your way.

Defeated, you look up from the shoe and follow her pillar of a leg to her short shorts. From there your eyes are drawn to hers, two cold, calculating irises that look down at you with scorn. "Beg," she demands.

"Fulda, please don't!" you start. "If you crush me now you won't get to take me to the mall and do whatever it is you're planning on-"

"Just kidding!" she says with a laugh. "I can't even hear you down there." In an instant Fulda coils her leg up, placing the toe of her shoe right over you. Her already huge shoe gets even larger as it rapidly descends toward you, quickly becoming all you can see. A split second later Fulda smashes you utterly, your body eviscerated under her shiny black shoe. For good measure she twists her foot back and forth, grinding you into the plywood, before walking away.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Trapped

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
"I'm not done playing, you little shit!" Fulda bellows as she sets her foot down in front of you. "Get back up and keep running, and try to make it a challenge this time!" You remain on the ground, hoping that she can keep playing the game without putting your life at risk. Fulda squats down over you, her enormous legs blocking out the sky as they push forward. She lowers a hand down to the street and sets it down on the street with only one finger making contact. "I said get. Up." Again you act like you don't hear her, hoping that she's just bluffing.

Fulda cocks her finger back against her thumb and carefully judges the aim with her focused eyes. Her finger explodes forward, slamming into your prone form and lifting you into the air. The force of her flick sends you sailing over a car and lets you reach a height of six inches as you fly down the street. Just as suddenly as you were launched you descend again, and hit the wooden street with quite a bit of force. You roll another block, unable to resist the force unleashed upon you by one of Fulda's fingers.

When you finally come to a stop you force your bruised body back to its feet and look back at Fulda. She's already stood back up to her full height, towering over the balsa wood houses like a living skyscraper, and is looking in your general direction. With a single step forward her foot smashes one of the trees you flew past, her gait covering half a block. "You better hope I don't find you in the street, bug, or I'll crush you like the street trash you are."

With only a few seconds until she's upon you again, you turn and run into a house behind you. Once inside you see that they actually have a decent amount of furniture, and the particular one you chose has a second floor. Quickly you run up the stairs and slide over to a window, then peer out so that you can watch the giantess approach.

From your second floor perch you see Fulda's massive body laying on the entire town block, her legs idly kicking the air. She peers inside the houses next to her, but before you can duck away she's turned her attention to your house. Her enormous icy eye fills the window you're looking through, and her pupil contracts as she focuses on you. Groaning you force yourself away from the wall and to the other side of the room, hoping to at least avoid instant death.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Nowhere to Run

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
You watch through the window as Fulda pulls away from the window and pushes herself back up to her feet. With a mere two strides of her toned legs she crosses the entire city block between her and the house you're hiding in, letting you see naught but her ankles through the window as the entire house is cast in her shadow.

Just as soon as they appeared her ankles vanish, and there are two loud crashes to either side of the house. For a moment you're kept in suspense until you hear the roof creak under immense pressure from outside. You look up as the ceiling is torn away from you by one of Fulda's hands clutching it as easily as she would a jar's lid.

You gaze up at the titaness standing astride your house as she glares down at you with contempt. Absentmindedly she tosses the roof aside, letting it sail two blocks before shattering on the ground. At this point she didn't even need to try to be imposing to you, and you are in awe of the power Fulda has. Fully aware that running is futile at this point you simply stare at the threat of her simply existing next to you and wait for her to act.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Exposed

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
As you watch Fulda bends down, her face essentially replacing the roof for you, to fully drive home your situation. "How are you not embarrassed by this?" she asks. "You were going to try to stop me, but I cornered you and now have you entirely at my mercy. Are you just that bad at being a hero, or are you so small that your only use is for me to torment?"

You start to reply, but are silenced by her hand rushing through the open ceiling. Before you can even try to dodge she snags you between her thumb and forefinger, lifting you off the ground so that any attempt you could have made to run is futile. Just as quickly as she grabbed you she lifts you out of the ruined house and up to her face, letting you feel the full effect of her tremendous beauty while she locks her eyes on you.

"Do you even know what a rhetorical question is?" she booms, making you clutch your ears as you dangle between her fingers. "You and I both know that you're only good for my amusement." Suddenly she releases you, letting you drop down into her open palm you hadn't even noticed come up.

Your landing in the middle of her palm is astoundingly soft, and you're glad to have something solid underneath your feet again. The skin of her open palm extends for ten yards in all directions, and you can see her fingers poised to crush you into her fist if she so chooses. Above you her glossed lips spread into a smile as she looks down at your tiny body. She begins slowly twirling her other index finger around you, each circle getting tighter, and eventually coos, "The question is, do I think you've outlived your usefulness?"
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Totally Dominated

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Suddenly Fulda lifts up her finger and poises it directly above you, letting it hang so that she's pointing at you. Quickly she jabs it downward, looking to poke you to death with her fingertip. You raise your hands to shield yourself for all the good it can do, expecting to be utterly crushed. Instead she simply gives you a light tap - still enough to send you reeling, but at least you aren't turned to paste.

In an instant her finger's in front of you, and you notice that the very tip of her finger is taller than you all by itself. Before you can reflect on this Fulda shoots it forward like a pool cue, ramming it into you and sending you staggering back towards her fingers. Her eyes shine with a sadistic delight as you're buffeted around by a single finger.

As you stagger past the uppermost line in Fulda's palm you're struck in the back, knocking you onto your chest. The follow through reveals that it was her middle finger slamming into you as you continue to find yourself bullied by Fulda's digits. She moves it back and rests it atop you, covering your whole body with just the end of one of her slender fingers so that only your head sticks out.

"You're surprisingly resilient," she remarks as she brushes a strand of hair out of her eyes. "Granted I'm not really trying to crush you right now. It would be really fun to grind you into dust, I admit, but this is good too. I feel really powerful either way." She presses down with her finger, increasing the pressure on your body and making you wince. Fulda lets out a quick laugh, then only stares at you as she considers what to do.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Fingertips

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Going Down

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
You slide out the bottom of Fulda's skirt feet-first while the opening is still situated over a wooden bench. When you land you do your best to tuck and roll, minimizing the impact of falling a couple inches but still getting bruised up in the process. Your roll stops far away from the edge, leaving you more or less in the middle and effectively stranded without someone big's help.

As you look up at Fulda however it seems as though she's right on top of you. The bench you're on is a few inches lower than the back of her knees, from which her powerful, tanned thighs rise up like silos. She's just far enough away that you can't see up her skirt, though with how much of her legs it reveals that's hardly necessary. For a moment she arches her back in a stretch, creating an incline you could use as a ski slope, possibly turning her butt into a ski jump.

Fulda steps away, allowing you to no longer be covered in her shadow. You watch her walk away to investigate a pair of boots, and when she calls over a sales associate you decide to look around some more to pass the time. The store is surprisingly dead for a Sunday afternoon; only you, Fulda, Lisa, and the saleswoman are there. Lisa is looking at a pair of shoes of her own, completely oblivious to your presence, and there's no way Fulda's going to let the random saleswoman see you.

Satisfied with your estimation of safety, you turn your attention to the wall of shoes on the other side. This store seems to have everything from flip-flops to decent quality high heels and boots and everything in between. From a distance you size up one of the flip-flops, and estimate that just its sole is almost certainly taller than you, and you would have to clamber up the side to even get at someone's toes.

Before you can do similar size estimates for a pair of stilettos a shadow falls over you, breaking your concentration. You whirl around and see a pair of legs. With trepidation you shoot your gaze upward to see which giantess is menacing you now.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Bench Warmer

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Before you stands the behemoth Lisa who, despite being the shortest of this group by far, still possessed enough strength in one of her fingers to crush you utterly. She's looking down and directly at you, her face drawn in puzzlement as she considers what to do. Wanting to remove all doubt you begin jumping up and down, waving your arms frantically in the hope that this is enough to differentiate you from a bug.

Cautiously Lisa kneels down and leans against the bench, laying her arms out to either side of you. Her deep brown eyes light up and her dimpled smile shines as she whispers, "Hi there little guy." Briefly she pauses to brush a strand of curly brown hair out of her face. "I'm Lisa! How'd you get here? You're too small to have gotten up there by yourself."

"Well it's kind of a funny story," you start, but Lisa cuts you off.

"Really you're too small to do anything by yourself. An action figure would be gigantic compared to you, and I bet you'd love to climb a Barbie! Boy, I can only wonder how I look to you!" She chuckles softly, trying not to alert anyone else that she's found you. "It's weird though, Fulda talking about finding tiny guys and me finding a tiny guy right now. Funny coincidence."

You gulp, remembering what she said she'd do. "The only question is, what am I going to do with you?"
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Meeting Lisa

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
You begin backing away as Lisa unzips her boots. "Oh, don't bother with that," she whispers, sliding one off. "Where are you going to go? There's nowhere to hide." Quickly she slides off her other boot and gets ready to put on the new pair she's about to purchase. "If you jump down, then what? You'll surely be crushed by someone." She stands up but leaves her head down at your level, thrusting her lips mere inches from you. "That's why I'm going to do it."

That's all you need to hear. Instantly you turn and run away from the titaness set on smashing you. Before you can get far however there's a loud thump, and you're knocked to your front by a wave of powerful vibrations. From the bench top you look and see that Lisa had kicked the top pretty hard, impacting the bench's corner with the heel of her boot.

You estimate the distance between yourself and Lisa. There's no way you're out of range, and you would have to run faster than the speed of sound to get far enough away that she can't stomp you from there. With a look up you sigh. Lisa is already drawing her foot up, letting her sole hang over you so that she can build up your trepidation.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Winding Up

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
This is unbelievable. You finally make contact with someone besides Fulda, and it turns out she's even crazier and more sadistic than your captor! Panicking you look from side to side, hoping to find some cover or even just a little chip in the wood you can take shelter in. As expected, though, you find nothing, and resign yourself to not being able to spot anything by the time Lisa's foot locks in position above you.

With a gulp, you brace yourself to be smashed. Lisa waves down at you and cocks her leg up minutely, building momentum for her monumental stomp. Her foot begins racing down at you and you squeeze your eyes shut, unwilling to look your destruction in the sole.

After two seconds, nothing has happened. You open one eye, expecting to still see her boot looming over you, just descending slower so that you'll be gradually crushed. No boot in the sky. You look off to the side, and surprisingly Lisa's gone too. It's like she's completely disappeared!

Fulda's walking over towards you, sashaying her hips and walking with a bundle of playful energy. She stops just in front of the bench, adjacent to where Lisa had been standing, and looks down at the floor. "That's my toy," she booms down as she lowers herself to one knee. You start running to the edge to see what's going on, and Fulda adds, "I'm the only one who gets to break my toys."

Slowly Fulda stands, becoming the dominating tower you've become accustomed to, allowing you to see that she's holding something small, about 4 inches long, in her hand. It's Lisa! "You... you... you bitch!" Lisa shouts, her voice just barely reaching you from Fulda's face. Though it sounded significantly smaller than before, her voice still had the qualities of someone several times your size. Of course, Fulda's hand is wrapped around her, allowing her head to stick out: if it were someone close to your size, she could only use the tips of her fingers.

Fulda smirks in response to Lisa's insult, a grin that you have come to associate with imminent danger. "I think you'll find I'm a massive bitch now," she says, "or maybe a colossal bitch. Regardless, a bitch who's way bigger than you. In fact, you're like a toy to me, just like he is. Remember what I said about breaking my toys?"

Lisa starts to panic, flailing her arms wildly. She slaps at Fulda's fist around her, unable to budge her grip at all while you watch from below Fulda's knees. In response Fulda starts lifting her towards her mouth and parts her lips, sending her tiny friend into even more of a frenzy. "No! Don't! Let me go!" Lisa pleads, trying to push her way out of Fulda's hand still. The giantess closes her lips, but keeps bringing Lisa towards them as she ponders what to do.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Fulda the Protector

choices: One new toy is enough for now
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
A grin spreads across Fulda's face as she holds Lisa's head mere inches from her lips. She simply holds her there for a few seconds while fear becomes more and more pronounced in Lisa's expression, before finally saying, "I think you need to reconsider your situation. I mean, you're trying to give me orders, but your voice is so tiny! Just imagine if I were to let you go and you started ordering around someone who doesn't know you - they'd smash you immediately! No, I need to keep an eye on you, for your own safety." You hear Lisa begin to protest, but Fulda quickly covers up her head with a thumb, squelching her.

The black-clad giantess turns and sits, planting her monumental form beside you. Casually the mountain that is Fulda bends over you, her enormous chest dangling above your head, then retracts and returns erect. Now she's holding a small handbag in her lap, a simple black purse with a gold clasp which should, you estimate, be able to hold Fulda's now-tiny friend. As soon as she moves her thumb from atop Lisa's head however the smaller woman begins screaming again, making Fulda roll her eyes.

"Yes, yes, I'm a bitch, whatever," Fulda mutters over Lisa's incoherent ramblings as she digs through her purse. "You'll get over it soon enough just like my other toy. Aha!" She withdraws her hand from her purse holding a pencil, then jams the eraser into Lisa's mouth. With a quick lever motion she breaks part of it off in the shrunken woman's mouth, silencing her yet again. For good measure Fulda also pulls out a ribbon and ties it around Lisa, binding her arms to her chest. As she drops her into the depths of her purse she adds, "Now stay quiet. If I hear a single peep out of that bag the next place you're going is under my shoe." With that she closes the handbag and sets it back down.

Fulda turns and looks down at you, then slides a gigantic hand behind you to act as a backstop. "How do you like your new friend, my littlest pet?" she asks, her voice practically a purr. "Try to keep her in line when we get home for me. I don't want to crush her, but if she mouths off I might have to. Might get you too, so be sure to be firm with her."

Before you can offer a response of how absurd that is, the saleswoman announces her presence. "I can't believe it but we do have boots in that size," she says, carrying a large shoebox. Fulda deftly adjusts her hand, covering you up with the palm while she deals with the interloper.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: A New Friend

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Two fingers slam into your back, pressing you into Fulda's palm as she lifts her hand away from the bench. "Oh, good!" she says, rotating her wrist so that you're oriented facing upward. "Just let me put on some stockings and I'll be ready to try them on." Fulda's fingers shift below you as she adjusts her hand, gripping something you're not quite aware of.

The pressure on your head eases as she lifts a finger away, allowing you to see once again. To your left your vision is obscured by a huge bundle of nylon, blocking your view of even Fulda's enormous fingers. On your right however you can see the entire length of Fulda's leg, starting at her foot's instep all the way up to her skirt.

Slowly you're dragged along the inside of her leg, first pressed into the soft skin on the sole of her foot as she covers it in nylon. Next she pulls you over the bump on her ankle, and as you look further up her leg you understand even better the scale she's on compared to you. As she slides you up her calf the slope reminds you of driving up a hill, except in this case the asphalt is Fulda's impossibly smooth skin, and has a healthy brown color rather than pitch black.

Just before you reach her knee Fulda pulls the stocking taut, and grabs the other one. She positions the stocking's opening around her toes, placing you on top of her bare foot while tightly clutched in her hand. The process plays out similarly to how it did on her other leg, starting with her pushing you down so that you make a slight indentation in the firm skin on her foot's top. You're pulled up along with the stocking, in awe at her magnificent legs that you're being softly dragged against. Just as the last one your ride stops at her knee, and you realize that, had she wanted to, Fulda could have easily crushed you at any point during that.

You're lifted away from her legs and held at around Fulda's chest level, her finger still out so that she can look at you and, perhaps more importantly, so that you can look at her. The gears are clearly turning behind the giant cheerleader's bright blue eyes as she considers what to do with you and her new pair of boots.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Leg Tour

choices: Fulda gets a bit carried away
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Fulda's eyes shift away from you to look at the attendant. "Can I get some space to try them out?" she asks. "I'd like a bit of room to walk back and forth." The attendant assents, leaving Fulda alone as far as she knows to get better acquainted with her footwear.

The hand holding you reaches out, and Fulda clasps the zipper between her thumb and forefinger. She speedily yanks it down, covering the entire length of the knee-high boot in a split second so that you're held down around where her ankle will be. Casually she turns her hand over, holding you so that you're facing the ground and the only thing keeping you up is the loose grip of her fingers. As soon as you're in this position your support vanishes, dropping you to the wooden floor below.

When you land the wind is knocked out of your lungs, and you struggle to get back to your feet. By the time you can stand again Fulda's already slid her leg into the boot and zipped it, encasing her entire lower leg in tight black leather. You watch as the giantess slides her other boot over and does the same, completing her totally synchronized outfit.

Fulda stands, becoming absolutely monolithic. She walks a circle around you, each click of her heels making a resounding boom as all of her weight is forced onto one point. When her sole comes down she takes extra care to make it as violent as possible, slamming it onto the floor with the force of an explosion. Carefully she sets her heel down next to you with mere millimeters of safety: you look up and see the smooth, concave pillar, at least seventy feet tall on its own.

The six inch heel gets pulled away, only to be replaced by the stark, clean soles of her boots. You're amazed by just how large they are - it's like a movie screen that comes to a point right at the end. While you ponder this Fulda sends her foot forward, the point just missing you to the right as her boot slams to the ground. She lets it linger, letting you see that the sole is just as tall as you, before she picks it back up. Her foot shifts minutely and she brings the point down again, this time nearly scraping your left arm.

Fulda grins, and lifts her sole up again. She slides her foot forward, dragging the heel along the ground to create a horrible grinding noise. The bottom of her boot blots out everything else, and you instinctively duck. Fulda swings her foot down, slamming it against the ground hard enough to make your ears ring. You try to stand up, only to find that your head is flush with her boot - if you hadn't ducked, you would have been smashed.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: These Boots Were Made for Walking

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
You're tugged to the side as Fulda slides her boot off of you, filling the air with a cacophonous grinding as the rubber sole is dragged along the floor.
