When the shoe's no longer in contact with you Fulda lifts her foot up and plants it some distance away, standing astride your tiny form. For a moment you stay down, concerned that she's trying to lull you into a false sense of security.

Finally you muster the courage to open your eyes and look up. On either side of you Fulda's legs, boosted up six inches by her heels, stretch for the sky, her shins tightly wrapped in black leather. From there her thighs sprout up like tanned buttresses towards their convergence point inside the tent of her leather skirt. You can see her white panties overhead, but out of the corner of your eye you catch her gaze and consider it might not be prudent to be caught staring up her skirt.

Fortunately it's not an issue for long. Fulda squats down, bringing her butt down to your level and essentially forming an awning above you. As you crane back to try to see over her the giantess's knees her face rushes over them, casting her watchful eyes upon you. The second she has you in her sights you're trapped between her thumb and forefinger as she snatches you up, handling you delicately for once.

Fulda unceremoniously plops you down onto her open palm and stands, lifting you thousands of feet in a second. She holds you at chest level, allowing you to look forward at her impressive cleavage and her to glower down at you. "Eyes up here, perv," she orders, a command which you immediately comply with.

She lifts you closer to her face so that she can better inspect you. "Nothing broken, nothing bruised," she remarks aloud, then her voice drops to a whisper. "Did you get smaller? I honestly can't tell, you were pretty puny to start. If you're literally shrinking away from me in fear though you're going to have a problem tonight."

She grins, and continues. "Lucky for you, I'm in a good mood. I'm so happy with these shoes that I'm going to let you decide how to travel for a bit! Now obviously I can't put you in my purse; all the usual stuff aside, Lisa is pissed and would smash you in her rage. But if you can reach something from my shoulder, you can stay there. Hell you might be small enough you can stay on my shoulder and no one will notice!"

True to her words, Fulda moves her palm over to her shoulder and tips it up, sending you sliding down the slope onto her tanned, solidly built shoulder. You bounce on your toes a couple times, feeling the skin on her shoulder bounce with you as your feet make tiny indentations. If you walk across her collar bone, you reason, you can jump down into her cleavage. Alternatively you can walk along the precipice on the back of her neck and slide down, hopefully coming to rest at her waist. However you are enjoying the fresh air for once, and though it may be risky you're already on her shoulder.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Testing Complete

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
You figure there's no point in risking a fall and dashing your body apart on the floor, so you stay right where you are. The small indentations you make in her skin let you feel secure enough to stand freely, looking at the world from the lofty height of Fulda's shoulder. If you can ignore the floor of taut skin or the waterfall of auburn hair to your right, it's almost like you're big again!

"These are fine, I'll take them," Fulda suddenly says to no one in particular. You look down from your perch and see a skinny blond woman, the store attendant, who had been invisible to you previously. At a glance, you estimate that she's half a foot shorter than the top of Fulda's shoulders. Unless this woman's a dwarf, you realize, Fulda's nearly seven feet tall right now.

When the transaction finishes Fulda spins, throwing you off your feet so that you faceplant on her bare shoulder. The rhythmic bobbing of her gait makes it hard to get back to your feet, but you realize you can't stay teetering on the edge. Though it's slow going you begin crawling towards her neck, hoping to stabilize yourself against it.

Fulda, of course, pays you no mind as you struggle to stay on her. You manage to reach your first checkpoint, the broad strap of her dress, in relative ease, the only difficulty being the rhythmic rise and fall of her steps. Unfortunately just as you reach out someone yells "Hey, Fulda!" from behind her, causing the giantess to spin around. Centrifugal force pushes on you, and in an instant you find yourself
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Like a Pirate's Parrot

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
You manage to grab the edge of her strap so as to avoid flying off into the crowded mall walkway and hold on for deal life while Fulda comes to a stop. "There you are Anni!" the giantess says, her chest rumbling as she speaks. Curious you peek over your shoulder to finally get a look at her, and are surprised by what you see when she comes to a stop before Fulda.

Instead of seeing eyes or hair like you expected, you're directly level with Anni's chest. Quickly you look down the slender giantess's body, expecting to see her wearing platform heels boosting her up, but she's just wearing a pair of stylish black ballet flats. You look up past Fulda's billboard of a shoulder to see her looking up as well, her expression as natural as ever. In order for someone to tower over Fulda like this right now, you reckon, she'd have to be well over seven feet tall.

You can't quite see her face, but one of Anni's hands brushes a strand of black hair away as she asks, "So where's that dork Lisa? Did she go off chasing boys again?"

"Nah, her parents came and got her. Apparently she didn't ask them and they weren't happy at all, said stuff like she's getting too big for her britches, needs to be brought down to size, stuff like that. She whined that they were making her feel small so they literally picked her up while she yelled, it was hilarious."

"Ha, what a loser!" Anni says, then changes the topic. "Did you already manage to get that dress dirty? There's something on the strap." Fulda's gaze shifts down to you, and you can feel Anni's on you as well.

"Huh. You're right, there's some sort of speck that definitely shouldn't be there," Fulda confirms with a threatening tone sneaking into her voice. Two hands come reaching for you: Anni's olive-colored hand, finger extended, approaches from the front, while Fulda's bronzed hand descends from above, fingers primed to pinch you off, both racing to see who gets there first.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Clinger

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Before Anni's extended digit can strike you Fulda's fingers pinch around you, forming a barrier the larger girl fortunately can't get through. Fulda tears your grip away from her dress and yanks you away, then holds her hand out, palm upwards. Her fingers part slightly, letting you drop down onto her expansive palm. You land inside the main horizontal canyon which closes up slightly as she cocks her finger back against her thumb. She shoots her finger forward, making Anni think she was flicking away a piece of dust - a perfectly normal thing, except in this case the dust was you.

"Just a little bit of filth," Fulda says, "no big deal." Unexpectedly she turns her palm over so that you're directly facing the floor. You grab on to a contour on her skin, allowing you to dangle but be relatively safe. From where you are you compare Fulda's stiletto heels and Anni's flats, still finding it remarkable how tall these girls are, especially Anni.

Acceleration throws your body back against her palm. Your head snaps to face the direction you're moving, and see that you're heading straight for her thigh - she was going to wipe you of! Whether she knows you were the speck, or that you're still in her hand are immaterial as her thigh races closer, a solid wall that will dash your body apart.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Dusted

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Fulda's palm races toward her thigh, carrying you along with it. You let go, hoping that if you can extricate yourself from this situation you can find some salvation on the floor and away from this woman who may not even be aware of your presence anymore. Unfortunately the G-forces of her swing are too strong, and you're held inside her palm.

Her bronzed thigh looms ever larger as her hand carries you toward your demise. The tanned skin of her muscular leg fills your entire field of view, and you see several freckles as large as you that most people wouldn't think twice about. For all the difference it makes, you scream.

Fulda smacks you into her thigh, turning you into a tiny red splotch. She rubs her hand around, trying to get the dirt off her hands and smearing you around. Finally she brushes off the impact site, sending your smashed body to the floor.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Splat

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Immediately you let go of your hold on her skin, confident that the momentum of your rapid movement forward will keep you off the floor. You slide down her palm and middle finger, her smooth skin not impeding you at all. At the end of her finger you ramp up slightly, sailing through the air towards her sculpted thigh.

You slam into her muscled leg at speed and stick there momentarily as your velocity makes you sink into her skin. Just above you her hand slaps her thigh, creating a resounding smack that reverberates in your ears. Gravity works on you as she brushes the dirt off, taking you out of reach of her powerful, sweeping fingers.

As you fall you do your best to remain flush with her skin so as not to end up lost on the ground. When your fall ends you find yourself on the top rim of her boot, a quarter-inch thick wall of leather that now was broad enough to accommodate you standing with ease. However you decide not to rely too much on that, and resolve to get to a more secure position where you're unlikely to be seen.

You place your hand on Fulda's knee as you begin running around the back for stability. Above you she finishes brushing nothing off her thigh, and her hand returns to being crossed over her chest. When you reach the direct back of her knee her other boot idly kicks at the ground and she asks, "So, we going home now, or what?"

"I don't know, I'm kind of hungry," Anni replies as you approach the zipper. "How about you Alyssa?" You had been so focused on the two massive girls you didn't even notice her walk up. You stop where you are and decide to dig in, still on the inside of her leg at least. Cautiously you plunge your legs between her taut skin and nylon stockings and force your way in, resting your hands on her boot tops. It's snug and not very comfortable, but it'll keep you alive once she decides what to do.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Getting the Boot

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
"I've got food at home," Alyssa replies, "and I'm pretty tired of shopping, let's just head home." You finish rooting yourself inside Fulda's boot and hook your feet through her nylon mesh just in time. Relieved, you lean back against Fulda's knee, confident that your position will be secure while walking.

Being moved while she walks is a familiar sensation by now, but you're unprepared for the force with which her heel strikes the floor. As soon as it hits your feet slip from the weaving and you involuntarily throw your hands in the air, letting you slide up to your chin into her boot. Fortunately everything's tight enough that you stop, but the next time her foot lands you're forced down a bit more into the hot, dark tunnel of her boot.

You don't know how long of a walk it is out to Anni's car, but you would tell anyone who asks that it's too long. The constant pounding wears on your nerves, and soon you've been incrementally dropped so far you reach the base of her heel, as evidenced by the rough skin of her sole and her foot's curve inward from you. What you thought was going to be a nice, leisurely stroll has turned into business as usual.

Before you can relax Fulda takes another step, and the nylon adjusts you slightly to account for her heel lifting minutely off the insole of her shoe. Between the leather at your back and skin above you, it's clear that the gap is just large enough to accommodate you, placing you directly where her heel's going to set down again!

You do your best to get out of a sticky situation, scrambling up the nylon as quickly as you can. There's a loud boom and a rumble throughout the boot's interior, and Fulda's heel compresses against your back, bending your body to fit its contour. Luckily you got far enough away to avoid being crushed, but it could be a while yet.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Bottom of the Boot

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
With every step you're nearly pushed back under her heel, but each time you're able to resist the force trying to push you into the unstoppable crusher. The sweat her booted leg generates drips down her stocking forming a pool at the bottom and makes it even harder to maintain your grip. One more minute and you know you'll slip and end up under her.

Fortunately you don't have to find out if that's true. After just one more rumbling step you hear a car door open and are pushed in unusual ways as Fulda swings her legs up to get into the vehicle. You maintain your grip as she brings her foot to rest sideways, a pleasant surprise as you're oriented properly with gravity from here.

She won't be stopped for long, and now's your only chance to get out from around her heel. First you try to simply walk away from it, but the tightness of her nylons quickly stops any ideas like that as you can't even stand up all the way. With the pressure of them constantly pushing down you decide to lay down on your belly and crawl forward.

The process is anything but fast as you make fractions of an inch in progress with each push. The exertion, combined with the heat and humidity of your environment, being making you sweat as well, adding further complications to your crawl and making you stop every few minutes to wipe the sweat from your brow. Your sweat mingles with hers on her skin to make it extra slick, causing every few pushes to be useless as your feet slide out from under you.

The texture of Fulda's foot changes somewhat, and you estimate that you're as far up as you'll need to be. You begin moving yourself away from the back of her foot, maintaining your slow crawling speed as you do your best to move. It feels like her foot's texture changes again when you hear a car door open and feel her leg begin to move again - soon you'll find out if all your estimations were correct based on where you are.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Footcrawl

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
There's a disorienting burst of movement as Fulda swings her legs out of the car, and you do your best to avoid sliding too much. The nylons help at least, and when you hook your foot into the mesh you feel as though everything's going to be okay - you may come out of this with a hurt ankle, but at least you'd come out of it.

Fulda turns her foot downward to step onto the ground, and you realize you've made an error. It feels as if you're lying on your back, with something soft and leather at your back and Fulda's foot on top of you. The sensation of falling overtakes you, and with another explosion of her heel slamming into the ground you're wedged further into your unenviable position.

The front of her foot swings downward, taking you with it. When it hits the ground you're sent into agony as her instep presses you against the inside of her boot, and you feel as if all of your bones will break simultaneously. As soon as she lifts up her heel to take another step, your body does just that. Fulda smashes you flat, and there's no way she even knows it.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Bad Guess

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Fulda moves her leg outside of the car and straightens it, disorienting you with the swift, broad movements of her leg. As she straightens her leg out and prepares to step down you do your best to keep from sliding around, but it turns out you're being held straight vertical - you had barely moved away from her heel at all - and gravity alone pulls you gently down, your fall slowed somewhat by her stocking.

Her stockings can't stop you from sliding down as soon as her foot lands on the ground, however. As soon as you hear the crash and the rumble you're thrust down the sweat-covered slope of her heel and land on the boot's insole, still bound by her stocking. Fortunately she has to pause to get her things out of the car, allowing you to take your time and properly secure yourself in the mesh.

Your position is even better this time, since you didn't have to rush quite as much. Still, the constant pounding of her heels makes it impossible to be comfortable even mentally, and the jingling of her keys in the lock fills you with relief that this is almost over.

The door opens, and you brace yourself for what you know is next. Unexpectedly Fulda breaks out into a run, her heels slamming into the ground even harder now and their crashing on the tile reaching almost deafening levels. The silver lining however is that she can easily skip two steps at once, so the usual horror of the stairs is minimized.

At the top Fulda slows her gait, and a few seconds later you breathe a sigh of relief as you feel her plop down against her bed. From outside your boot you hear a zipper being let down, followed by the plop of leather hitting carpet. Another zipper follows and the pressure around you lessens somewhat while light pours through the crack, illuminating a thin line of Fulda's leg. You press yourself against her as she yanks off the boot, fully bathing you in light.

The beige-tinted light makes you blink as your eyes adjust to being out of the boot. Though your vision is broken up by the nylon mesh all around you it's clear that you're back in Fulda's room, held as close to the carpet as possible. Through the nylon you see her bundle up the stocking on her other leg, pushing it down and pulling it off, then she begins on yours.

She lifts her leg up, holding you aloft as she begins removing the stocking holding you. Patiently you wait as the hold on you gets looser, letting you drop further away from her foot. Tension builds as her fingers pass you, and you get ready to be freed as her thumb approaches.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Back Inside

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Fulda pulls the stocking back over her heel, freeing you from its damp embrace. As you plummet towards the ground you can only hope that the carpet is soft enough to cushion your fall: beyond that, you'll have to come up with a plan as it happens. Your thoughts are interrupted when you land harmlessly in the middle of Fulda's palm, the soft skin keeping you safe.

The titanic foot above you clears from the sky, and you're slowly lifted to around chest level on Fulda. "If you get any smaller I'm going to need a magnifying glass," she teases, then changes the subject. "You're still alive though, which is kind of surprising. Makes me think you might actually survive the First Shrunken Games tonight."

"Shrunken Games?" you repeat. "What are you talking about?"

If she even heard you, Fulda ignores the question. Instead she simply lowers you to the ground and tips her hand, sending you sliding down to the carpet where you do your best to balance upon a fiber. She then opens up her handbag, reaches in, and pulls out a tiny person, bound and gagged. You hope that it's Lisa and Fulda didn't go on some sort of shrinking spree.

Fulda leans over and places the shrunken person next to you. Though she fits entirely in Fulda's hand, when she lets go so that she can drop to the floor you notice that you only come up to her ankle - as big as Fulda was to you when you first shrank. You gaze up at the tiny woman towering over you. She seems to be unaware of your presence, focusing instead on the much larger Fulda as she unties the ribbon binding her and pulls the eraser out of her mouth.

"Do you think this is funny you dumb bitch?" she yells as soon as she can. Yep, definitely Lisa. "Unshrink me! This is bullshit and you know it, what's even wrong with-" Lisa's interrupted as Fulda's foot sets down on front of her, then slams forward. Lisa isn't crushed, but Fulda leaves her foot there, pinning her in place.

"Do you know what that means?" Fulda asks. "You fit entirely under my foot. You're under it right now. If I shift my weight just a little, you'd be smashed into the carpet." She increases pressure slightly, making herself smile and Lisa scream. "It means I'm in control here, not you. You're the size of a doll, a toy to me - an insect that I can crush whenever I please. I hope you understand how things work for you now."

Fulda steps back, releasing Lisa, and allowing her to stand again. "Now. I have a full night of activities planned for the two of you. Oh right, you should probably look down and meet your new friend." Lisa does so, her huge, doe eyes falling on you from beyond her ample bosom. She gasps loudly and covers her mouth, prompting Fulda to laugh and say, "Yeah, he's the one you almost crushed today. Don't try that again - if I can't find him and I didn't squish him, I'll assume you did it and squish you too, got it?" She pauses for effect, then says, "The first activity for tonight is..."
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Back to the Grind

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
The maddening crash of her heels on the tile followed by the rumbling when she slams the rest of her foot down continue unabated and seem like they'll go on forever. Rivulet's of sweat pour down the length of Fulda's leg onto you, adding to the heat she's generating and making it hard for you to breathe. To make matters worse the effort of holding yourself in place makes you sweat as well, and your grip begins to loosen.

One of your hands slips out, and before you can put it back her boot slams into the ground again, throwing you against the base of her heel. You scramble to reestablish your grip and pull yourself out but every time you try to force your hands through they punch into a strand of nylon. Fulda takes another step and you're pushed inward, situating yourself directly under her heel.

A loud bang from under you, and her foot comes down. You're crushed instantly beneath her heel, your body totally flattened into a smear.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Deadly Net Trap

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Fulda's fingers suddenly form a fist around the waist of her shorts and she violently jerks up on them, throwing you out of your position inside. You tumble through her shorts, desperately seeking something to grab onto so that you don't end up on the floor, but in all the chaos and movement getting a firm hold on anything proves impossible. In a second you plummet to the carpet, landing softly just inside the doorway.

You watch Fulda gently fold her red shorts which used to serve as your home, then move to leave. Her right leg shoots forward, a burnt sienna tower of muscle and skin based on an enormous black flat. Fulda's heel touches the ground then she slams the rest of her foot down, creating a minor earthquake. Quickly she does the same with her other foot, though she seems to be moving somewhat slower and more ponderously than she usually does. The crack of her left foot hitting the floor verges on deafening.

Fulda's right knee begins to bend again as she prepares to take another step. You realize that you're directly in her path, and pleading looks upward are met with nothing. It's too late to get out of the way now. All you can do is hope she misses.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Discarded

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Fulda's right foot lifts off the ground as she takes another step forward. She keeps her shoe pointed down as her leg churns forward, bringing her enormous implement of destruction closer to you. As it's carried through the air you can do nothing but hope that her foot will pass harmlessly over you, or you'll be just an inch too far away.

Her heel touches down about half a football field away from you, putting you well in the kill zone. Indeed the sole of her shoe is looming over you, promising to strike any instant. The only interruption on her shoe sole's terrain is the number 12 - there isn't even any tread to hide in.

Futilely you raise your arms as if they'll protect you from a million-ton giantess. Fulda finishes her step, swinging her foot down on top of you. In an instant you're crushed, utterly flattened beneath her shoe as she couldn't even care less.

Fulda, however, hears a satisfying crunch as your body is smashed beneath her, and she momentarily breaks her gait to twist her foot, grinding you into the carpet. She knew all along.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Dismissed

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Fulda's leg churns as she takes another step forward. You watch as her movement unfolds, seeming to be in slow motion as you wait to see whether this will be your doom. She pulls her foot forward, nearly dragging it along the floor until she turns it back upright. Her heel touches down on the carpet, and her foot stretches up like the Leaning Tower, primed to tip over at any moment. It's hard to tell just how far away it is.

The enormous shoe in front of you slams down like a mouse trap, the crash from it overwhelming your senses. However, you're still alive - the toe of Fulda's shoe is a fraction of an inch from you. If you wanted, you could reach out and touch the underside of her shoe's toe were you not absolutely paralyzed with fear. To your right Fulda's left foot drifts past, its route not posing any threat at all to you.

You have no time to be relieved, however. Hot on her heels comes Alyssa, her massive Converse stomping in the path already blazed. Briefly you see the diamond pattern on her soles as one slams down in front of you, fortunately some distance away. This is followed shortly by a horrific crash to your left as Alyssa's shoe smacks the floor. The giantess pays you no mind either, and it seems to be pure luck that she didn't smash you right then.

There's no time to revel in your good fortune now, either, as the titaness is moving to step over you. Closely you watch her enormous shoe moving towards you, every detail on her well-worn sole in strong definition, when you notice her shoe laces dangling down so that they drag along the floor! This could be your chance. You do your best to position yourself in what you estimate to be the shoe lace's path and get ready to grab on as it passes by.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Second Chance

choices: Stay and wait for one to enter
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Desperately you make a grab for the loose shoelace, hoping to avoid being stuck in a changing room for the foreseeable future. Alas, it slides right through your arms, and even smacks you in the face as if adding injury to insult. Your one opportunity gone you collapse to the ground, Alyssa's foot crashing down indifferently hundreds of feet away. As she takes one more step, which might as well be on the other side of the country for how much it can affect you, she closes the door.

You force yourself to stand up after your failed attempt to stow away on Alyssa's shoe and take inventory of your situation. You're alone, about half an inch tall, in a popular clothing store's changing room. All that's in here with you is a broad plateau of a stool, a mirror you can use to look at the ceiling, and some hooks thousands of feet above you on the walls. The carpet is fortunately solid enough that you won't sink in, though you would probably get injured if you feel from atop the stool.

With a quick glance behind you see that you can crawl through the crack under the door and escape quite easily, and from there you can formulate your own plan. Alternatively you can move out of the doorway and wait for someone else, then try to get their attention. It's the middle of the day and the store sounded fairly busy from inside Fulda's shorts, so either way you should encounter any number of giant people.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Alone

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
In a rush you scuttle off to the side, getting out of the doorway and making sure the door won't hit you when it's swung open. You press yourself against the wall, trying to make yourself inconspicuous for the moment; after all you may recognize the giantess who enters, and want to avoid being found by her.

The seconds turn into minutes as you stand there, waiting for someone to come in. You twiddle your thumbs, listening intently to each sound coming from outside your changing room and weighing the odds as to whether it's a person about to come through that door. As the wait continues you begin to imagine what sort of person will come in next. Would they be tall or short, relatively speaking, and how old would they be? A mother with two young hellions at her feet, or someone single who just wants to get in and out?

Your imaginings are disrupted by the door's latch clicking and the enormous wall of wood sliding inward. An enormous red shoe strides in, followed by another, the feet they cover encased in black nylon. The woman brings her feet together and turns around, making sure the door's secure, then spins around on her heels and walks to the stool. She hangs the clothes she brought in on the hooks, takes one garment from the bundle, and turns around.

You're astounded to find that you recognize her as Lana, a woman who was a grade ahead of you in school and is now going to the local university. She has straight black hair down to her shoulders, narrow arched eyebrows and eyes that are nearly a shade of violet. Her nose is gently curved and it looks like her lips are perpetually pursed, with her chin extending out to a smooth point. She's wearing a simple purple T-shirt and a dark orange skirt, and her black stockings run up to at least her mid thigh. From what you can see she's rail thin, and unless you're remembering the wrong person she's about the same height as you were before shrinking, if not a bit taller.

Lana kicks off her shoes, slides them to the side with a foot, and plants the stocking-clad foot back on the ground. You remember her as being difficult to get a read on, but easy to get along with even if she was somewhat withdrawn. When you went to the college to take a class they put you in one of hers, and she was clearly one of the smartest students in the hundred-person class, if not the very top. Unfortunately none of this helps you predict how she'll react to a tiny you running up to her, and as she unzips her skirt to change you realize you don't have an unlimited amount of time to decide.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Enter Lana

choices: It's good, she knows you're a person
It's real bad, you're an itch or a bug
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
It's wholly serendipity that the first person to come along is someone that you vaguely know, and there's no point in squandering this opportunity. Besides, if you don't go with her, the next person to come in might be a very angry Fulda who suddenly realized that you're not on her anymore. You walk a bit towards her as you vacillate, trying to work up the courage to make a move.

Finally you manage the resolve, and run towards Lana just as she drops her skirt. The orange curtain hits the ground with a thud, and Lana deftly steps out of it with one foot, then picks it up with another. Her very minute movement has shifted her a few inches, and you adjust your path to account for her being a hundred feet further to the right from where you started.

The new giantess wastes no time in slipping on her new garment, a light brown corduroy skirt that looks like it will extend to just above her knees. She lifts up one foot and slides it in, planting her foot firmly on the ground. As you get closer Lana stretches ever taller into the sky, your own size making it difficult to judge how far away from her you are.

You turn your gaze forward again and see that her foot has vacated its spot. With a glance up you see Lana slipping it into her skirt, and it's directly above you! Quickly you reverse direction, running the away from Lana now, as her foot luckily gets briefly tangled in her clothes. It turns out you acted just in time; her foot slams back to the ground, close enough that the nylon nearly brushes against your neck as it goes by.

When you turn around you're face to face with her big toe. It's so big and so close to you that you can't see anything besides it: your whole field of vision is a black mesh stretched over a single one of her toes. Undaunted you wrap your hands around a strand to hoist yourself up, climbing up the face of her toe on her stocking. It's essentially like climbing a chain link fence, but when you crest the top you find yourself on the solid platform of her toenail.

Lana towers above you while you stand on her foot, a barely perceptible speck against the dark black outline of her stockings. You look up her body as it stretches for nearly a quarter mile into the sky until you reach her face, which by sheer fortune is looking down at you. In fact, if you didn't know better you'd swear that the two of you locked eyes, despite you being smaller than one of her pupils.

Hoping to get noticed you start jumping up and down, waving your arms above your head. Your hopping takes you off her toenail and onto the soft skin on top of her foot, increasing the chances that she'll at least feel you. Beneath your feet Lana's foot subtly shifts, and when you look up she's definitely looking back. You can't quite tell whether that's good or bad yet.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Choosing Lana

choices: Carry you in a closed hand
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Lana's eyes widen in shock and her mouth opens, her jaw dangling in shock as she realizes what's happening. A hand claps across her mouth to muffle her words and she begins crouching, her knee pushing out over you as she lowers herself to the ground. She's careful not to jostle her foot at all as she lowers her body, allowing you to keep broadcasting your position by moving as wildly as possible.

"Stop doing that!" she whispers down at you, hoping to avoid drawing attention to the changing room. "I don't want to break your arms when I pick you up." Dutifully you obey, fearing that she may be as wrathful as Fulda if you don't. You simply gaze up at her as a thumb and forefinger close around you, securing you firmly but gently. Lana slowly lifts you off her foot and begins to straighten her legs, standing once more.

You offer no resistance as you're transferred over to her other hand, waiting palm up. Slowly she raises you up to eye level, her humongous irises dwarfing you on their own. She moves you away again, holding you down around her mouth, and whispers "Don't I know you?"

"Yeah, we're in a class together, I'm-"

"Speak up," she interrupts, her voice hissing like the wind. "I can see you talking but I can't hear anything." Before you can restart your introduction she changes her mind.

"I actually might have something in my room that could help," she offers. "I'm not sure if we do know each other, but I'm Lana. If you trust me enough to come with me, just nod and I'll get you out of here. You nod vigorously and she smiles, her pearly white teeth gleaming in the fluorescent light. "I can't carry you out like this though, so I'll have to put you somewhere."
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: The Recognition You Deserve

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
Lana stares at you for a moment, her mind furiously working between her dark blue eyes. You continue jumping and waving your arms, certain that she just needs a few more seconds of watching you to put it together.

The giant woman sighs, and off to the side you see a huge black shape moving towards you. You stop dead in your tracks and cease drawing attention to yourself when you see what it is - her other foot, toe angled down, heading right for you! Quickly you spin and head away from it, running across her toes confident that she just needs a few more seconds.

As you pass by her second toe her other foot lands, toe pointed, exactly where you had been standing. The impact throws you off your stride, sending you end over end to land on your back on top of Lana's nylon stockings. Her big toe is wiggling back and forth on her foot, trying to scratch an itch, edging closer as she follows your movement.

You try to stand, but your foot is tangled in the mesh. Lana's toe lifts up and glides over, centering you beneath its point. She brings her toe down, in a millisecond compressing you between her toe and foot. Simultaneously your whole body pops open as she smashes you flat, her big toe continuing to scratch the itch as your insides spread out, tickling her some more.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: The Risks of Meeting Giant Women

choices: She can't believe you're climbing her
There's a building she'd love to smash
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
The titanic leg beside you lurches forward in a step that covers several hundred feet from your perspective, though it was a rather cautious stride for Fulda. When her foot sets down her shoe leaves an imprint on the plywood street she's walking on, creating an ungodly crunching sound as it sinks in. For the moment she seems not to have noticed you on her and is content to continue her rampage.

You reach up, searching for a handhold, and manage to find one in the contours of her skin. It's not too sturdy since even to your bug's eye view her legs still look incredibly smooth, but when you push yourself up it's able to support your weight. With a couple of quick grabs you make your way on top of Fulda's protruding ankle bone, where you pause to take your bearings.

As soon as you reach your temporary sanctuary, Fulda steps with the foot you're perched directly above. The sudden acceleration nearly throws you from your spot, and you're struck by a mild sense of vertigo as you glide through the air above rooftop level. When she sets her foot back down over a block away from where you had started nearly throws you to the ground if not for your position nestled atop her ankle.

Not wanting to spend any more time here than necessary in case she decides to stop smashing houses with this foot you start climbing, your fingers digging as much as they can into her taut skin as your legs do their best to support your ascent. While you climb you feel her weight shift almost imperceptibly as her other leg shoots forward. You watch as Fulda carefully positions her shoe directly above a toy sports car and brings it down. She grinds her foot back and forth then takes a small step forward off it, letting you see the completely flattened car in her wake.

Your frantic climb has taken you about halfway up her calf when she lifts up the leg you're clinging to again, making you stop and clutch as tightly to her leg as you can. She lifts you much higher and faster this time, momentarily letting you hover at an even altitude with her butt, before she slams her leg back down again. You clutch yourself as firmly against her calf as you can and look down at the balsa wood roof you're racing toward. Fulda's foot smashes it entirely, knocking all the walls down simultaneously from the force. The impact makes you lose your grip and you slide down a few inches before you're able to grab hold again, dangling loosely by your fingers.

Fulda's weight shifts imperceptibly again as she gets ready to take another step, then she pauses with her heel hanging in the air. "No way," you hear her mutter, then she lets out a low chuckle.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Ankle-Level Antics

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
"I know you won't," she responds, "because I won't give you a chance." Before you can think Fulda tosses you into the air, her palm catapulting you several feet above her. You look down and see her tracking your arc, her eyes locked on to you like a homing missile. When you reach your apex she opens her mouth, revealing a row of pearly white teeth ready to receive you.

Gravity catches up to you, and you rapidly descend towards her mouth. Just before you slide in she closes her lips, letting you land directly where they part. Though her soft lips cushion the fall you don't even have time to mistake this gesture for benevolence before she puckers her lips, letting them wrap around you and suck you into her mouth.

Her tongue is warm and slippery as you slide down it, and in the short distance you manage to get covered with saliva. Behind you her tongue raises up, forcing you even further down into her waiting gullet. Fulda's throat closes around you as she swallows, forcing you down into her stomach to be digested.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Harsh Punishment

1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.content:
You grab what appears to be a loose noodle as firmly as you can and begin pulling on it, trying to get it free from the pile. Before you can get it out though there's a strong tug, pulling you from your feet and into the mountain of spaghetti. The spaghetti starts wrapping around you before you can let go of it, and in a moment you're cocooned in pasta against her fork.

Fulda lifts her food from the plate and starts moving it toward her mouth. "Fulda, no! I'm on here!" you shout. "I'm on your fork! Don't eat me!" You're not even sure if she can hear you, but you desperately hope she can. Between the noodles you can see her face looming ever-larger.

You get a response, but it's not the one you hoped for. "You knew the rules, it's not my fault you grabbed some of my food." You hear her chuckle, then she adds, "I guess now you are my food!" Through your cocoon of spaghetti you see her mouth open wide, a cavernous maw lined with pearly white teeth and her red lips acting as a border.

The fork enters her mouth, a moist, humid environment completely devoid of light. She pulls the fork away, sliding it out between her lips, freeing you somewhat from your enclosure. You wrestle with the noodles, hoping to break free before she starts chewing so that you can have one more shot.

With a lot of luck and some strength you manage to slip out from between the noodles, and start running towards her teeth on her tongue. Just before you reach it though she starts chewing, creating a gnashing barrier that would kill you if you tried to cross it.

You realize it's all or nothing, however, and prepare to jump through the next time she lowers her jaw. That time never comes though; instead she raises her tongue, pressing you against the roof of her mouth, and slides you backwards toward her throat. Saliva gathers around you, and you mix with the chewed-up spaghetti in her gullet as her throat muscles force you down. There's no going back now, and Fulda will digest you.
1111112121111111212211112111112211221122.title: Being Fulda's Dinner

1111112121111111212211112111112212.content:
You stand on the rim of the bowl, silently staring back at Fulda. Several tense moments pass before she finally says, "Looks like you have an obedience problem. We'll work on that." She jabs her spoon forward, striking you in the chest and knocking you back.

For a brief second you fall, then splash down in the milk. You grab on to one of the cereal bits to keep from going under, the oat life preserver keeping you afloat. Fulda leans over the bowl, her face looming over you. Malice seethes in her eyes as she swirls her spoon around you, gathering up bits of cereal in the basin. She lifts the spoon out not even an inch in front of you, splashing you as the spoon emerges.

She eats that bite, then submerges the spoon for more. This time she's more direct, and drives it directly towards you. Before you know it you're lifted out of the bowl atop her spoon on a one-way course for her mouth. Just as she parts her lips to shove you in you're able to jump off the side, landing back among the cereal.

You spend as much time as you can submerged, surfacing only when you absolutely need air. Every time you do Fulda attacks with her spoon, but you're able to swim out of the way, leaving her with only cereal.

This continues far too long for your liking, and each time you surface you see fewer and fewer O's floating alongside you. At last, while swimming to avoid her spoon, you feel a strong current pulling on you, and a sudden shift in which direction is up. You bounce off the bottom of the bowl as milk rushes past you towards a confluence. Once more you surface, unable to fight the current below any longer, and are met with the sight of Fulda's upturned nose. You look down and see her mouth open wide, all of the milk flowing in there and taking you with it.
1111112121111111212211112111112212.title: Milk Bath

11111121211111112122111121111122121.content:
Just before you slide into Fulda's gaping maw you manage to brace your legs on her upper lip, allowing you to escape the milky current below. Your escape is short-lived however, since as soon as Fulda swallows and faces forward again you slide off her lip and back into the bowl.

Your escape did not go unnoticed. Immediately Fulda stares down at you, and you feel exposed at the bottom of the empty bowl. No matter which direction you run you know you won't be able to escape her reach, so rather than running you stand still.

"Still standing strong, you little prick? I know just what will fix that." A massive hand shoots down at you, and you're snatched up in Fulda's fist. She pumps her hand, shooting pain throughout your entire body as it's compressed between her fingers and palm. Surprisingly nothing breaks - she must have known exactly how hard to press to keep you intact.

You feel the vibrations of her ascending the stairs again, and know that soon you'll be back in her room. Sure enough, just as you think that you feel yourself rotated 180 degrees, then the floor falls out from under you as Fulda opens her fist. You plummet to the ground and land on the carpet, embedded to your waist in the fibers.

Fulda casually strides away, her humongous hips shaking with each step. She walks behind the bed and says, "You liked these heels so much last night, I was going to let you play with them today. Now, they'll have to show you who's in charge here." Momentarily she returns, wearing the heels you had hidden under the night before.

Almost seductively she approaches you, both hands behind her back. She walks within inches of you, her sole slamming down hard enough to generate a shockwave. You gaze up the giantess, from the heels twice as all as you are following her powerful, daunting legs to her skirt which barely covers anything. From behind her back she pulls two items, a clear plastic dome and a blue ribbon. "We could have had so much fun today, pet, but you decided to be moody. I'm still going to have fun, though." One of these items will be used to torment you, but which?
11111121211111112122111121111122121.title: Unswallowed but not Safe

111111212111111121221111211111221211.content:
Fulda leans over, holding the dome out. "I think you need to see what will happen to you if you keep being a little prick," she says, placing the dome over you. She stands back up and lifts up her foot, then sets it against the dome's top. Amid the very vivid lines on the sole you see a smattering of debris from other things she had smashed previously. "These are my stomping shoes," she announces, grinding her foot on the dome.

She pulls up her foot and sharply slams it back down, making a ringing noise that resonates throughout your enclosure. It's hard not to feel as if you're going to get smashed as her foot drills down. Briefly she moves her foot aside and looks down to see how you're doing. You look back up, and strangely don't see any malice in her eyes. Instead the expression on her face is more fitting for someone who's had to tell their dog to sit one too many times.

The reprieve doesn't last long, and Fulda coils up her leg again. For the second time her foot comes crashing down like a meteor, slamming into the dome with immense force. Her great strength causes the dome to form a large crack, and the ringing sound is too much to bear. You try to free yourself from the carpet while screaming up, "Fulda, I've learned my lesson! You can stop!" hoping she can hear you.

At first it looks like things are going your way. She pulls her foot away and stands there for a second, considering what to do. With the toe of her shoe she flicks at the dome, lifting it up and sending it rolling away. As you push at the carpet, trying to escape, she raises her foot one more time. Fulda gives a quick wave, and moves to slam her foot down again.
111111212111111121221111211111221211.title: The Thunderdome

choices: She ties you to her ankle
1111112121111111212211112111112212112.content:
Her shoe slams into the carpet all around you, and you find yourself looking at the spire that supports her heel. You glance behind you and see the rest of her shoe, meaning you're in the open space where her foot is raised up. If you had been much bigger, you think, you would've been crushed.

Fulda slides her foot to the side, relieving any claustrophobia that might have been developing. You gaze up her indomitable leg, stretching hundreds of feet toward the sky, as you try to contemplate just what, exactly, Fulda can do to you next. She glares back down at you, but doesn't seem surprised you're not a stain on her shoe.

The monumental leg you're staring at bends sharply as Fulda squats down next to you. A giant hand envelops you, and you're plucked up by the collar of your shirt. As Fulda stands you're carried along with her, your feet swaying idly as she adjusts her hand back and forth. This time she doesn't bother holding you up to her face, and instead lets you dangle in front of her massive chest.

"I don't think you've learned yet," she declares. "You know my power, but you tried to run away from me yesterday. You need to know that no matter what you do I will always be on top of you." What could that even mean?
1111112121111111212211112111112212112.title: Tutelage

11111121211111112122111121111122121122.content:
Fulda bends over, lowering you nearly to the ground. Roughly she shoves you against the inside of her left ankle and holds you there with her index finger. You gaze up at her face, trying to discern what she's doing here, but come up empty of any motivations. She simply shakes her head, booms "Nah," and slides you back into her hand.

A moment later you're back against her ankle, but upside down. Fulda's forefinger remains pressed against you until it's replaced by a light blue ribbon pulled a bit too snugly across your chest. You watch her hands tie it into a neat bow on the other side of her leg, then she stands up. Across the way you see her right foot lift up and she takes a step forward, nice and slow like she's just walking.

If she's just going to walk around with you on her ankle this won't be so bad, you think to yourself. Before you can continue this line of thinking blood rushes to your head as Fulda sharply lifts her foot, readying it like she's about to kick forward. Just as suddenly as you were raised she stomps her foot back down, making you see stars from the dizziness. Your eyes adjust to see her take another step forward, and you brace yourself for the next headrush.

Fulda changes it up this time. You feel a strong force as you're lifted into the air, but for a split second you're looking down at the carpet. Acceleration builds as Fulda continues lifting her leg, forcing more blood to your head, until it reaches its apex just shy of the ceiling. You can't even breathe a sigh of relief before the world starts racing again - you're inches away from the ceiling, then you're inches away from her butt. As she kicks her foot into the air you feel more and more pressure, until you can't take it anymore. She lets loose a particularly strong kick and you black out from the G-forces.
11111121211111112122111121111122121122.title: Bonding Time

111111212111111121221111211112.content:
The shoe you're under is torn from above you by Fulda's forceful hand. She begins shaking it out like all the others until she glances down and notices you. "Gotcha," she declares, and adjusts her grip on the shoe. She winds up her arm to bring it down, and you turn and run.

Fulda must have anticipated this, since before you can even clear the line of shoes she grabs a boot beside you and twists it. You're smacked by the toe of the boot and knocked backwards, landing on your back. You look up at Fulda, looming over you and poised to squash you at any second.

"No! Don't!" you plead, hoping to find some pity with her. Her only response is a chuckle, and she swings the shoe down. Before you can even scream it's made contact, and you're flattened between her shoe and the carpet.
111111212111111121221111211112.title: End of the Line

11111121211111112122111121112.content:
You descend from the bed the same way you got up, and sprint to the dollhouse door. It flies open just as you hit it, and you're sure to slam the door shut behind you. You survey the area around you and discover that it's surprisingly well furnished for a dollhouse that likely hasn't been opened for several years. Hurriedly you walk to an adjacent room, grab a tiny blanket and drape it over yourself, then hide beside the window.

Fulda throws open the door and strides in, planting herself directly in front of the dollhouse. You look up from her ankle to the rest of her towering form and see that she's looking around the room, fortunately not down at your hiding spot. She reaches out and taps the very window you're looking through twice with her shoe, throwing you back in shock, before she turns toward the bed.

Carefully she begins peeling back the layers of covers and sheets, shaking them out once they're off the bed. "I'm glad you found somewhere else," she says. "It's no fun being a predator if you have stupid prey." She bends down and her muscles flare as she rises, throwing the mattress off the bed frame. "But make no mistake," she says as she moves on to the dresser, "I will find you and I will crush you."

She lowers herself to the floor and quickly looks underneath the bed and dresser. As soon as she finds you're not there she pushes herself back up to her hands and knees and crawls over around the bed. You can't see what she's doing, but for now you're glad she's on the other side of the room.

"There's only one place you can be now," she says, crawling back towards the dollhouse. "You could at least make it fun for me and take off running. I'd just love chasing you down and cornering you." Naturally you don't, and simply watch as Fulda draws ever closer to your hiding spot.

You watch intently as she stops and rocks back onto her heels, standing patient guard and waiting to pounce. For a second you look at the door, expecting her hand to shoot through, and when you look back you see one part of Fulda occupying the whole window.
11111121211111112122111121112.title: Predator

111111212111111121221111211121.content:
"I spy a future stain!" she booms triumphantly. You turn to run, but Fulda's massive fist punches through the door, shattering it into a dozen pieces and making you dive to the floor. Now you're easy pickings for the giantess, and she quickly snags your prone form and drags you out onto the carpet.

You look up and see her crouched on her hands and knees, staring at you. "Pretty dumb move, hiding in your house," she says, inching her face closer to you. Fearfully you try to back away, but you bump into Fulda's fingers blocking your way back. Between her hand behind you and her face looming ever closer you feel boxed in, and do the only sensible thing - you panic.

You spring to your feet and start running towards the dresser, moving too quick for Fulda to immediately react. She slams her other arm down in an attempt to block your path, but using your momentum you're able to vault over her wrist and keep running.

A shadow falls over you as you pass the bed post. You estimate you have about two feet between yourself and relative safety, with a very angry giantess in pursuit. The odds are against you, but you're running for your life and give it your all.
111111212111111121221111211121.title: Homewrecker

1111112121111111212211112111211.content:
Sensing an imminent stomp you come to an abrupt halt, the friction of the knee-high carpet fibers greatly assisting your deceleration. Almost as if on cue Fulda's foot slams down in front of you, bringing you face to ankle with the giantess. You don't stop to admire the view though; instead you roll to the right, just avoiding her other foot lining up heel to toe.

Nimbly you get back to your feet and continue running to your destination, breezing by her shoe. "Dammit!" you hear Fulda shout above you. Though you don't turn around to see the raging giantess, you soon don't need to. With a massive thud the giantess topples and falls to the ground beside you, her legs splayed out in disorder. The way is now open to you, and the greatest threat has been neutralized.

"Get back here you little shit!" the giantess bellows as she slams her leg down in front of you. Thinking quickly you jump and vault over her calf, then slide down the side of her shin to her ankle. You hit the carpet moving as fast as you can, mindful not to get too close to her shoe. The wall of shoe beside you lifts up, and you dive forward into the safety of the dresser just before it slams back down. Swiftly you retreat away from the rubber diamond pattern to the wall.

Fulda's face appears in the gap, her cold eyes glaring at you. She shoves her enormous hand into the slit but gets stuck at her forearm, her fingers harmlessly snatching for you just inches away. The giantess withdraws her hand, but continues staring you down. "You're trapped, you little idiot, and by the rules I already won. I might be merciful though if you choose to surrender yourself. I mean, I'd still have to do something to you, but I wouldn't crush you, probably. If I have to lift this dresser and come get you I'll be pissed. Your choice."
1111112121111111212211112111211.title: Taking Cover

1111112121111111212211112111212.content:
Your flight takes you to the open plain of Fulda's carpet, fully exposed to the hazards of the giantess. You refuse to be intimidated however and continue running, certain you can make it before you're caught.

A giant shoe impacts the carpet in front of you, and you find yourself staring at the instep of Fulda's converse. You turn left to try to run around, but before you can take a step she brings her other foot in, trapping you between her legs.

"Looks like I caught you," she taunts as she wiggles her toes inside her shoes. "I wish you had been a more elusive prey, but who am I kidding, I'm just an excellent hunter." You look back and forth for an escape route, finding only the rubber soles and canvas of her shoes and her bare ankles. Desperate you look up, hoping that she'll have mercy if she sees how pitiful you are, but all you can see are her calves curving up to her toned thighs.

"Fulda, please!" you cry out. "Let me live and I'll let you prey on me all you want!"

The giantess chortles. "Frankly you suck at this, and it's already boring. Word of warning: you should kneel down so you minimize the agony of your last moments." You see no other option and comply with what she says, lowering yourself so that your entire body is under her shoe's rubber lining.

Slowly the shoe opposite you slides back, and you have less and less room as her shoes align. You're pushed into the shoe to your back, and in response brace your arms and legs against the approaching rubber wall. Your pitiful strength is no match for the giantess's might however, and your knees and elbows bend as her shoe slides further. Pressure builds, and in one second more her other shoe's entirely filled the space of the insole, crushing you flat. Fulda further grinds your body into an unrecognizable smear as she continues pulling her foot back, then rubs your remains off into the carpet.
1111112121111111212211112111212.title: Grinding

111111212111111121221111212.content:
You turn to run the other way, but before you can even get off the plate Fulda snatches you up. Her powerful fingers pull you away from the plate, your legs futilely pumping at the air as you continue trying to get away.

Fulda turns you to face her, and you see her red lips grinning from ear to ear. She lifts another hand toward you, two of her massive fingers primed to take you up. They grab the back of your shirt just as her first hand releases you, letting you swing back and forth under her hand.

Slowly she raises you towards her face, letting the trepidation build as you pass over her chest. She licks her lips and lets out a satisfied moan as she holds you before them, letting you dangle helplessly. Fulda opens her mouth, letting her hot breath pour over you. "Fulda, stop!" you plead. "Please don't eat me!"

Fulda laughs cruelly in reply, her low chuckles washing over your dangling body. "Snacks don't talk," she says, and opens her mouth wide. She carries you between her lips and through her teeth, then drops you onto her wet tongue. Before you can try to escape she flicks her tongue, sending you between her molars. There's enough light for you to watch her molars race down, and an instant later they land, crushing your body and splitting it in two.

Fulda finishes chewing you and swallows. "Not bad," she remarks, "but where am I going to get another one?"
111111212111111121221111212.title: Snack Time

11111121211111112122112.content:
Did she honestly think you'd wait around for her? She's made it crystal clear - if you stay with her you will be crushed sooner rather than later. You give her a few seconds to get in the shower before you make your move.

When you're quite confident she's gone you press yourself down against the locker's floor and slide along on your stomach, allowing yourself to slip under the smothering cheer uniform without getting entangled. Fortunately you bypass any openings which would lead you back into the warrens of Fulda's uniform, and in a few minutes you're able to breathe fresher air.

Directly in front of you light pours in through some slats in the locker door. You dash forward and position yourself directly below one, then wedge your body partially through it. With all your might you push off the floor with your legs, forcing yourself through the opening and exposing yourself to the outside world. Before you fully escape you turn around and grab hold of where you had just escaped, and look down.

It's a long way to the floor. Cautiously you allow yourself to slide down a bit and shift your handhold to the top of the door beneath you. Little by little you shuffle your hands toward the hinge, taking care to keep your tiny body from swaying. When you reach the hinges you climb down like a ladder, securing your hands before dropping your legs further.

Finally, after several minutes of climbing, you reach the floor and look around. You see a girl standing several feet away getting ready to leave, unaware of your recent feat of strength. The showers are still on so it's probably not Fulda, and you don't want to be trapped in the locker room all night. If you want to leave with someone besides Fulda, this is your chance.

You sprint towards her, hoping you can get her attention before she takes a step and escapes your reach. Your charge is bringing you towards the back of her ankle, which is fortunately bare due to the girl's low-top Converses. With your meager momentum you slam your shoulder into the titaness, staggering you back several inches after impact.

You look up the impressive body of this giantess to make sure you got her attention. It's hard to tear your eyes away from her legs sculpted by years of exercise, but somehow you manage to look past the pillars and continue up. By now the giantess has turned her head down, looking for what ran into her. It takes a moment, but your pleading gaze meets her casual glance.
11111121211111112122112.title: The Great Escape

111111212111111121221121.content:
The two of you hold eye contact as if you're trying to stare each other down, unsure of what to do. Fulda's eyes widen, and you're certain that your face also belies your intense surprise, if only she could see it.

Both of you spring into action simultaneously. You spin around, sprinting away from her as fast as you can while looking for some cover. Fulda also turns around, her shoe grinding against the concrete as she pivots in your direction, and you're briefly cast in shadow as she draws up her leg. An instant later she slams it down in front of you, blocking your path. Without thinking you push off her Achilles tendon, propelling yourself to the outside of Fulda's stance. She responds by flicking her foot towards you, slamming it into you hard and sending you flying.

You land in a roll, but you're able to fall gracefully and get back on your feet out of it. In front of you was a bench - if you could reach it, you could possibly hide there long enough for someone else to come in and see what Fulda's doing. You run as fast as you can, but you're engulfed in shadow again. Fulda will bring her foot down again, trying to block your path or even stomp on you right here.
111111212111111121221121.title: On the Run

1111112121111111212211212.content:
No more than an inch in front of you, a massive shoe crashes into the ground, driven by a cruel and vengeful giantess. It sounds like a high-speed car collision, and just like that situation you find you can't stop in time. You run into the side of her shoe, which knocks your legs out from under you and sends you tumbling over her laces to land on your back just on the other side.

A deep, menacing chuckle sounds from above. "Fee fi fo fum," Fulda taunts as she lifts up her sole to glide it over you, pivoting on her heel. You cringe as the diamond pattern etched in rubber races before your eyes, then she sets it down on the other side of you. "I smell the blood of a small, dead man."

"Fulda, wait!" you plead. She either doesn't hear you or doesn't care and picks her sole back up so that she can slide it across your vision again.

"I warned you, you little shit," she says. She sets her shoe down beside you again, then picks it back up to repeat. "That was a promise. If I didn't keep my promises, what kind of a terrible person would I be?" Her shoe clears your vision again, and you see her looking down at you, a happy smile on her face. You look for any possible escape, but as you look up her leg and see how many times longer it is than your entire body, especially from this perspective, you give up.

Just then Fulda swings her sole back above you, and lets it linger this time. Slowly she beings pressing it down. "Fulda, no!" you scream. "Please don't crush me!"

The giantess fakes a yawn. "I'm already bored of that. You're useless even to me now." Fulda idly twirls a strand of red hair. You feebly raise your hands to shield yourself as several tons of shoe and foot relative to you slam into you. You're immediately squished, but for good measure Fulda grinds the ball of her foot back and forth, making sure she's totally smashed you.
1111112121111111212211212.title: Crushed Hope

1111112121111111212212.content:
Fulda took her position at the apex of the pyramid, and looked down. It was about ten feet from the ground, and the floor was covered with mats, so if she fell from there it wouldn't be a big deal. For her passenger, though...

She slides her knee right between the shoulder blades of the cheerleader below her on the right. With a slight shift in her weight, Fulda jams her knee into the other cheerleader's back, causing her to cry out in pain and break formation. With her disruption the rest of the pyramid falls apart, and Fulda goes tumbling to the ground, butt first.

From inside her skirt you feel her making minute corrections with her leg, then hear a pained yelp. You feel yourself falling despite being held in place by Fulda's panties and butt. She pushes you out a bit more, and you feel the strain as you're shoved further out.

Fulda lands, accompanied by the satisfying crunch of your body being smashed by her ass. She briefly smiles with the knowledge that you have been crushed, and continues with practice.
1111112121111111212212.title: Engineered Failure

111111212111111122.content:
You feel light pressure all over your body as Fulda's butt touches down on you. As a last-ditch effort your raise your arms up and begin pushing, trying to force the girl to get off your shrunken body. "Please! Fulda!" you cry, trying any way you can think of to stop her titanic ass from smashing you. The pressure increases, and you can't even struggle anymore as your arms have been pinned down. You try to breathe in deep for one last bellow, but your entire body has been covered by this gigantic cheerleader's rear. Before you can try to draw breath again Fulda sits down with the entirety of her weight, smashing you into a small, bloody pancake.

Fulda hears the slight crunch your body makes as she grinds it into paste and winces. "I was just starting to have fun, too. Oh well, I would've gotten bored of it soon anyway." She gets up and goes to change her skirt before going out to practice, leaving your smear in the dirty laundry.
111111212111111122.title: The Rear End

111111212111112.content:
Your eyes were able to follow the screw as it sailed through the air, bounced off a locker on the far side, and rolled to a stop beside the bench you first started at. You don't waste any time trying to bargain or complain and just start running, taking the direct path between her monumental legs. Just as you're passing under her massive body the tanned column to your right lifts up and slams down again right in front of you. The impact knocks you off balance and you stumble into Fulda's enormous pristine white sneaker. "Just a reminder of what'll happen to you if you fail, bug. Now get off my shoe before you get it dirty, I'm not sure if your pitiful condition is contagious and I sure as hell don't want to catch it." With a push you lift yourself off her shoe, and she slides it back out to where it had been.

Once that terrifying obstacle's out of the way you continue, full steam ahead, to get that screw. You keep yourself under the bench, concerned that there may be some unaware giant cheerleaders in here still, or that Fulda may block your path again. As you run you glance back towards Fulda, who's spun around to watch your progress. Her cold gaze makes you feel even smaller, and you can just see her powerful leg itching to be brought down atop you.

When you reach the screw, you realize the light must have been playing tricks on you earlier. It was either that or you had somehow gotten smaller, since the screw was rather a bit more than half your size. You slide both arms under the screw's shaft and try to heft it, but it doesn't budge. You try a second time, and again you can't pick it up. Across the room you see Fulda's stern face glaring at you, wondering what you'll decide to do here.
111111212111112.title: Screwed

1111112121111122.content:
With a groan you push yourself away from the screw, making it wobble but not move. Trying to lift it had exhausted you, and having to deal with Fulda's intense threats wasn't helping. You wave your arms over your head to signal to the huge cheerleader, and shout, "Fulda, this is insane! I can't possibly lift this!" To emphasize it you put forth one more feeble attempt to hoist the screw, unable to even make it budge.

Fulda lets out a deep sigh and crosses the room to where you're standing. With each stride her impossibly long, toned legs bring her closer to you. It doesn't seem like she's in a hurry, since she takes the time to strike her heel into the ground each step, showing you the sole of her shoe and the striking contrast it has with her dark tan. When she gets a couple feet away from you, she swings her leg out wide, then cuts it back inward. The toe of her shoe barely misses you; if you had been standing just half an inch forward, there's no doubt you would have been splattered across the side of her shoe. As it is, the screw she kicks goes flying, bounding into the lockers. She sets her foot back down, making it so that you're standing between her legs, and places both hands on her hips while she glares down at you.

"I want to do it Fulda, but I can't!" you protest. "It's too heavy!" Fulda responds by tapping her foot. "It's not that I'm unwilling!" She taps her foot again. "If you tell me to do anything else, I'll-"

"Just shut up, you little twerp" she interrupts with her booming voice. "I gave you a simple task, and you're too weak to do it! You really think I'm going to keep you as a pet now?" Fulda stares down at you, considering what to do.
1111112121111122.title: Giving Up

choices: Legs - stand as long as you can
11111121211111222.content:
"I ought to smash you flat right now," she says, tapping her foot menacingly. "You're so small and useless, I don't see much point in keeping you around." She begins to lift her foot off the ground, and you cringe. "I'm not going to yet, though. You at least want to do what I tell you, but you were probably really weak even before you got small. Are you willing to do whatever it takes to keep this foot off you?"

"Yes, Fulda!" you reply. A vicious smile spreads across her face.

"That's exactly what I wanted to hear. You may think I can't get you in shape, but you'll find I can be an excellent motivator." You shudder at what that could mean. "Now what are you going to do first?"
11111121211111222.title: "You have to start working out."

11111121211112.content:
"You're a slow little man," Fulda says. "A slow, dead little man, not even fit to be my pet." You begin backing away, trying to put some space between yourself and the giantess, but it's no use. Your back runs against the bottom of the lockers, and you're entirely trapped. She brings her foot down and you raise your arms as a feeble defense. Her shoe clips you, knocking you down but not finishing you off since it couldn't be flush with the locker.

As you watch from the ground she lifts her foot up again, and rotates on her other one. Her foot runs along the length of your body, and you look up past her browned legs to see the malice in her icy eyes. She pulls her red lips into a sadistic smile, and then everything's blocked out. Fulda's pristine white sneaker impacts, compressing your body flat against the floor. With a quick twist of her foot she makes your mush unrecognizable, and heads out to practice, thinking nothing more of you.
11111121211112.title: Not Good Enough

11111121212.content:
You ran as fast as your little legs could carry you, hoping to escape the impending fate of being an ass tattoo that would befall on you if you weren't quick enough. Alas, every last bit of energy you exerted during your sprint was all for naught as the cheerleader's ass eventually eclipsed your entire view and landed on top of you without any mercy.

As if too add insult to injury, the cheerleader slightly moved her buttocks to attain a more comfortable position on the bench.


The pain was excruciating. It was as if a thousand pounds of sheer, unadulterated force were barring down on you and you were completely helpless to stop it. The humid atmosphere and the slight stench only made this experience even less tolerable. However, your situation was not destined to be a long one by any means and the cheerleader got up from the bench and walked to her next destination. There is just one question that needs to be answered.

Where you stuck to her?
11111121212.title: Under her [cheeks or crack]

She was jumping up and down but you were stuck so tight u didn't move a inch. She then did the splits and smashed you into the ground. You got alittle loose when she got back up. They continued to go and made a pyramid and the girl you where on was on the top.you felt loose and thought you were going to fall. Did you fall or did u stay stuck?
111111212121.title: Back to cheerleading

111111212122.content:
You were beyond thankful when the giantess stood up, clearly done with whatever she had sat down for. You managed to lift your head to see her trumping off, only to see a few more girls lingering in the locker room. One in particular was headed this way, bag in hand. Fear strikes through you as you scramble into a pile of clothes that was left behind. Sure you wanted to be found and helped, but you definitely did not want to be sat on again. Put the bar of soap back in her personal container
1111112122121.content:
