"Ah, it's quite simple really. You see, your younger sister Maddie is actually a witch in training. We were brought to life by her magic, so she is our princess." One of the dolls said.

"Yes, and several days ago, she mentioned that she was learning a new shrinking spell. She said that she would be testing it on her older brother, and that she would introduce us to you." Another one continued.

"So what you're saying is that my little sister has magical powers that I've never even heard about?! That's crazy!"

"Well, do you have any better way to explain all this?" The first doll said with a giggle.

"Uhhh... I guess you have a point there..."

Just then, the sound of the door opening interrupts your conversation with the dolls. Looking up, you see that _______________.
1241.title: Meeting Maddie's magical dolls

choices: No one is home at all.
12411.content:
looking up you saw Maddie looking down at you. She had lifted up the top of the doll house and was looking inside. She looked down at you and was smiling from ear to ear. She must of been happy to find you shrunk down just like she was try to do.

"I can believe it worked. I didn't think that it would work the first time." Maddie said looking over at you still smiling.

"Maddie? I didn't know you were a witch in training." You said.

"It's true, I'm a level 2 now that I've mastered the shrink spell." Maddie smiled.

"That's great. When can you make me big again?" You said.

"Ummm..... I can't. That's a level 7 spell. I can't make you big again for a while." Maddie said sounding sad.

"How will I get back to my normal size?" You said.

"Don't worry. My teacher can help you. She is a level 400 witch and she is over 600 years old!" Maddie smiled.

"She must be covered in wrinkles." You joked.

"No. In fact she looks only 20 or so. She has mastered the age spell. Do you want me to take you to her?" Maddie said.

"Please. I really need to get back to my normal size. I have a date with Jenna tomorrow." You said.

"Alright then. Lets go to Lady Scarlet!" Maddie said as she picked you up and headed to her closet.

Maddie chanted a quick spell then opened her closet door. The closet had turned into a portal and Maddie was going to use it to get to her teacher, Lady Scarlet. Maddie stepped into the portal and you noticed that it felt a little weird going through a portal.

"Lady Scarlet! Are you home?" Maddie called out.....
12411.title: Maddie the witch.

choices: You will help Scarlet with her spells and magic.
You will pay off a debt your sister needs to pay.
124111.content:
"Maddie, Is that you?" A young female voice called out from the other room.

"Yes. I need your help with something." Maddie shouted.

"What have you done this time girl? Turn you friends into frogs or sent your family to another dimension?" The voice called out sounding a little annoyed.

"I shrunk my older brother. Will you make him big again?" Maddie asked.

A girl walked into the room dressed in a red hood. Her body was very sexy and young looking and her hair was black. You couldn't tell how long it was because of her hood. Her clothes looked like something you would find in a video game. It looked very sexy and mystical at the same time. Hey eyes were scarlet red and you almost lost you way looking in them. But her chest was massive. E-cup and very bouncy.

"You must be Fred. Nice to meet you." The women said.

"Can you turn him back Lady Scarlet?" Maddie asked.

"It will take about a week or so but I can do it." Scarlet said.

"A week! I need to be big now!" You shouted.

"Hush up boy. A week in this world is only mere seconds in your world. now keep quiet or I'll have to punish you." She said looking you right in the eyes.

"Give him to me and I'll have him good as new in no time." Scarlet said.

"Alright." Maddie said as she handed you over to her busty teacher.

Maddie then walked back into the portal and it shut behind her. Scarlet looked down at you in her hand and smiled.

"I'm sorry for what Maddie has done. She doesn't mean any harm. Lets get you back to normal now shall we." Scarlet said.

Scarlet took you into the back room and grabbed a old book off of a shelf and opened it to a page written in a strange language. She read something out loud that you couldn't understand at all.

"Alright. It's done. just wait another week and you'll be back to normal." Scarlet said.

"Thanks. What will I do until then?" You said.

Scarlet gave you a weird look then a creepy smile.....
124111.title: Meeting Lady Scarlet.

choices: The outfit Scarlet wants on the floor.
The snake coming you way and it's hungry.
1241112.content:
"In the week it will take to turn you back to normal, you will work for me to pay off the debt your sister has managed to work up being my student." Scarlet said smiling giving you an evil yet sexy grin.

"That doesn't sound so bad." You said looking up at Scarlet.

"You just wait and see. Your sister has a debt longer than the great wall of china!" She said almost ready to laugh.

"It can't be that bad." You said.

"Even if your sister gave me all the gold in the world it would only be a fraction of a percent of my bill for helping her learn magic. I am the strongest Mage in the world and I don't come cheap." She smiled looking down at you.

"Fine, I'll help you out." You said.

"First I need you to grab my clothes from my closet. My red cape and red leather outfit. The one that shows a lot of skin." Scarlet said setting you down on the floor.

"Were is your closet?" You asked.

"Up stairs. Now go get it or I'll put a curse on you." Scarlet said.

"What kind of curse?" You asked.

"I'll turn you into my slave. You'll never want to leave and always do my bidding." Scarlet said.

"Fine. I'll be back in a few minutes." You said leaving the room and heading to the stairs.

"Watch out for my pet snake. The spell Maddie put on you makes you immortal so you wont die but you should still be careful." Scarlet said as she went back to her work.

You didn't know why Scarlet let a snake wonder her home. Maybe it was witch? looking around her house it looked like a old hut you would find in the old days. The walls were covered in shelves filled to the top with books and positions. She even had a magic wand on one of her shelves. When you got to the stairs you realized that this would be very difficult to climb. It took over five minutes for just one step. After almost two hours you got up to the top step. There was only one room up stairs so that must have been her room. You walked in and when you looked around you saw.....
1241112.title: Maddie's Debt.

choices: Put the curse on you. (The curse will make you fall in love with Scarlet.)
Scarlet will spare you. (If you move in with her and live with her.)
12411122.content:
On the other side of the room you saw a massive snake. It must of been over 30 feet long and it was red just like Scarlets hair. The snake saw you right away and charged. Before you could move the snake opened it's wide mouth and slammed it shut right on top of you. The snake was eating you! You couldn't believe it! Not even 2 hour shrunk and you were being eaten by a snake. At least you wouldn't die, the spell Maddie put on you made sure of that.

The snake swallowed and you were sent down into it's stomach. It was a quick and slimy ride into it's stomach. You might have enjoyed it if it wasn't for the fact that the snake just made you it's lunch. When you arrived in the snakes stomach you realized that it was tight. You could also feel the snake moving. You started to feel the snake move down stairs and you thought it was going to see Scarlet.

"That was easy. I guess you fell for it Fred." Scarlet said from outside the snake.

"Scarlet! Get your snake to let me go!" you shouted.

"You don't get it do you? I Am the snake!" Scarlet said.

The walls of the snakes stomach started to get bigger as Scarlet turned back into her human form. When she was finished she was completely naked but you couldn't see that being trapped in her stomach.

"Alright, you got me. can you let me go now!" You shouted pushing on the walls of her stomach.

Scarlet just laughed as she saw a small hand print push out from her stomach."Sorry but you didn't get my dress. Now I will have to put a curse on you."

"Please Scarlet! I'll do anything!" You said.

Scarlet gave it a little thought before she decided to.....
12411122.title: Tricked by Lady Scarlet.

choices: "Okay bro, I'll turn you back. It's not like I planned to shrink you, anyway."
"I think that I want to keep you like this for a while, 'little' brother."
"Oh CRAP!" *Maddie realizes that the shrink ray broke when she dropped it*
1242.content:
As you were about to walk away, you heard a voice coming from behind you.

"Fred? Is that you?" the voice asked.

Turning around to face the source of the voice, you were shocked to realize that these dolls weren't really dolls at all! They were three of your sister's closest friends, and they were all shrunken just like you were! Upon closer examination, you immediately recognized who they were: Sally, a cute 9 year old girl with curly red hair and glasses, Heather, a pretty 11 year old girl with long brown hair, and Alice, a tomboyish 10 year old girl with short black hair. You couldn't help but wonder why your sister's three best friends were shrunken down to 7 inches tall.

"Yeah, it's me. So, what are you three doing here? And more importantly, why are you so small?" You asked them.

The three girls looked at eachother and giggled before Alice placed her hand on top of your head and spoke up.

"It's a long story, little guy. And I don't think you're in the best position to be calling us small right now." She said, poking fun at the fact that you were an inch shorter than each of them. Alice always did love to tease you, and this was no different.

Brushing her hand away, you took a step back. It was somewhat awkward to discover that you now had to look up to meet the girls' eyes. Sure there was only a one inch difference between you and them, but at your current scale that one inch made a surprising difference. It was enough that the top of your head only came up to around their chins, and considering that at normal size these girls only came up to around your chest, the fact that they had any height advantage over you now felt a bit odd.

"I've got plenty of time. Please, just tell me what's going on here." You said.

"Alright then, I'll explain it." Sally said while adjusting her glasses. "You know how my parents are genius scientists and they invent all sorts of cool stuff."

You simply nodded. It was true, Sally's family was well known throughout the neighborhood for their brilliant inventions. Even Sally herself was incredibly smart for her age, and many people believed that she would grow up to be one of the greatest scientific minds in human history.

"Well, last week my dad gave me a box of gadgets that he couldn't get to work right and asked me to throw them away for him. One of them was a growth ray that would have been used to make food gigantic and end world hunger. The thing is, it didn't grow things at all. The ray ended up shrinking whatever it hit instead, so it was deemed a failure. Still, I thought that a shrink ray could be really useful if I could program it to grow things back to normal afterward. I mean, it would be so much easier to clean up my room if I could just shrink everything to save space. So I worked all night long to add a reverse function to the ray. In the end I got it to work just right, so yeah." Sally concluded.

"The next day, Sally showed us the shrink ray. Alice thought it might be fun for us to take turns shrinking eachother and playing all sorts of games together, so we decided to try it out. And she was right! When you're this small, the whole world is like one big playground! So we've been doing this every day since." Heather said.

"But isn't it dangerous being so tiny? I mean, we're the size of dolls right now. Who knows what could happen to us at this size!" You asked, still somewhat nervous.

"That's why we make sure to always leave one of us at full size. As long as we have someone to make sure nothing bad happens, there's nothing to worry about! Today was Maddie's turn to stay big." Alice said.

"But then where is she?"

"She just left to get some snacks for us to eat. She should be back any-"

And as if on cue, the door to the room swung open, and you watched in awe as the towering form of your little sister walked in. You were amazed by how massive she looked at your current size. Shutting the door behind her, Maddie strolled over to her bed and sat down, dropping a bowl of snack foods in front of her.

"Come on up, girls! I got the snacks!" She said energetically.

The three shrunken girls then walked past you and started climbing the bed sheets as fast as they could, seemingly racing eachother to see who would get up to the top first. Once all of them got up, you saw your sister pick up Sally and whisper something to her.

"Ummm, Sally, I think I should let you know... When I was on my way to get the snacks, the shrink ray fell out of my pocket and went off when it hit the ground. I think that it might have shrunken someone else... Have any other tiny people come into my room while I was gone?" Your sister asked nervously.

"Why don't you take a look down there and see for yourself." Sally said, pointing toward your location.

Taking Sally's advice, Maddie looked down to the side of her bed and saw you standing there. With a surprised look on her face, she reached down and scooped you up in her massive hand.

"Oh my gosh! Fred, is that you?! Awww, you look so cute and tiny!" Maddie said, gently placing you down next to the other three girls.

"Yeah, and you look totally massive from down here. Do you think that you could turn me back to normal now?"

"Hmmm... Let me think about that for a bit..." Maddie said with a playful grin forming on her face.

Maddie then took the shrink ray out of her pocket and started fiddling with it in her hands. After a few seconds of thinking, Maddie finally gave you her answer.
1242.title: Your sister's shrunken friends

choices: Skip forward to Maddie comes back, (is there a problem)
12421.content:
You smiled, Finally some good luck, Maddie pointed the ray at you, and a great blue blast of energy shot out of it, it hit you and suddenly a great tingling sensation went through your body, and suddenly you began to grow, looking around it was a bit like looking out of the window of an aeroplane on take off, only much slower, everything around you was getting smaller, Maddie’s friends who you had only minutes had to crane your head to look eye to eye, were staring up, you were about twice as tall as them now, making you just over a foot. Looking around you watched, as you were raised up, you could see top of her dresser now, it was only about a foot away. Looking at Maddie, it was almost as if she was shrinking, as you watched your eyes passed her chest, then her neck, then for a second you were eye level with her, that made you just over four foot. You smiled only one and three thirds of a foot left. Walking over to the cupboard you stood with your back to it, so you could keep track, you had already passed the five foot mark, by the time you reached it, and you were fast approaching your real size, you stood there, and suddenly you found you had got there.

You walked towards the doors, to leave your sister and her friends to their game only to suddenly notice you were still growing, everything was still getting smaller, you looked around shocked, you were about six four now, and you were still growing, Maddie and her friends stared in horror, you head hit the celling, just after you passed the seven foot mark. looking down Maddie looked like a doll now, while here friends looked like insects, but you still hadn't finished growing, you had to bend forward, as you had already reached the celling, your back spread forward, consuming all in front of you, Maddie backed away, scared, eventually when you felt you had reached the very limit it was possible to get to and still fit in this room you stopped, looking at yourself you realised you had to be at least eight feet tall, maybe more, your feet looked large shoe boxes, your legs were like tree trunks, looking down at them you stared horrified, "WHAT THE HELL DID YOU DO TO ME?" you bellowed with all your might, Maddie looked terrified, her friends huddled up to her legs, to them your voice must have felt like a hurricane.

"I seem to have overgrown you," Maddie said timidly, "THEN CHANGE ME BACK," you shouted, Maddie held up the gun, and pulled the trigger, but nothing happened, she pulled it again, before looking at the gun, "it seems to be out of battery," she said even more timidly, "WHAT!" you bellowed, "please don't hurt me," Maddie sobbed, and then she started to cry, your anger vanished, you didn't mean that, slowly you sat down, and in a much softer voce, you said, "it’s okay, I don't blame you," Maddie looked up, "you don't "she said, "of course not," you replied, "it was just an accident, and I over reacted, I can wait till it recharges," Maddie looked at you, and dried her eyes, "okay," she managed, "I have the charger but it will take a few hours." "I can wait," you replied. Maddie nodded, and picking up her friends, she walked out. Leaving you sitting there on her bed, to you it felt like a small chair, you couldn’t stay here, it was far too uncomfortable.

Getting to your feet, you again hit the celling, “Ow” you screamed, you had to get on your knees to move across the room, granted it didn’t take long, with great effort you managed to squeeze through the doorway, struggling you found you just managed to get through, once again your head hit the celling, this was really getting annoying, you practically crawled over to the stairs, looking down you realised this was going to be a problem, you couldn’t walk down the stairs, your feet were larger than the stairs, sitting down, you stretched your legs down, they reached over halfway to the bottom, very carefully you made your way down, but it was difficult, you regretted every single wish to be taller, this was even worse than when you were mouse sized, at least then you could stand up straight and walk properly, now you couldn’t even do that, with difficult you managed to make it to the bottom of the stairs.

Still struggling you made it along the hallway, to the kitchen, then finally out the side door in to the garage, smiling you could finally stand up straight, you felt you spine click, as you stood up, looking around you were shocked at how tall you were and how small everything was in comparison, as the ray hadn’t simply made you taller, you had grown in all ways, you picked up a shovel, you laid it down in the palm of her hand, almost the whole tool rested there. Suddenly a great banging noise grabbed your attention, you turned and seeing nothing turned back, you then realised you had slammed your hand shut, opening it, you found you had snapped the wooden handle into pieces, you carefully placed them down. It hadn’t occurred to you, that with this increase in height, your strength had increased, as you were in all ways large, turning back, you spotted a large pile of wood, bending down you causally picked it up. You placed it back down, and then your mother’s car, not a very big car, but still.

Temptation proved too strong, walking over you bent down, and grasped it, struggling you stood up and lifted the thing into the air, you stared shocked, and causally I placed it back now, this struck you as weird, you expected to be able to move it, and maybe lift it, not lift it like a feather, you stared at your arm muscles, in comparison to your new body size, they hadn’t got any larger, but your strength couldn’t have increased that much? Could it? I mean that car had to weigh at least two thousand pounds, and you were lifting it like a football. Turning you saw a solid Iron pole, your dad must have left it from when he worked at the ironmongers, you bent down and lifted it up, once again temptation proved too much, and struggling you began to put force upon it, nothing would happen you told yourself, but as you thought that the bar began to buckle, then bend, and suddenly it was now bent into a pole half the originals length.

This was all too much, you dropped the pole and sat down, on a wooden desk, suddenly the desk collapsed and you hit the floor, groaning you got up, and looked down at the pile of broken wood. “Okay this was too much,” you said to yourself, fortunately your skin seemed to have got denser, and that counteracted, the extra force of your much increased weight upon hitting the floor (basically the heavier a thing is, the more force it hits the ground with, to all who didn’t understand that.) You sighed it looked like you simply had to wait till Maddie came back, until them, you were forced to stay her, and resemble Goliaths older brother.
12421.title: Of course it goes wrong

124211.content: Well is there or isn't there?
124211.title: Skip forward to Maddie comes back, (is there a ...

1242112.content:
You sat there in the wreckage for hours, waiting for Maddie to return, it was incredibly tedious, you were too big to touch most things, and things you weren't too big for you had no interest in, still it would get better, just as soon as you were returned to your real size, this one was awful, I mean through there life, thousands of people wish to be taller, but now you were here, you realised they were all wrong, this was terrible, you felt like a monster, you were to big, too tall, to large, if anyone saw you, you bet they would run of screaming, you sighed, and looked at your watch, shouldn't be much longer now, you thought.

And sure enough Maddie came running in, with all her friends now back at full height, holding the size ray, "is it finished?" you asked, Maddie nodded, "then change me back to normal already," you said, Maddie nodded, she pointed the ray at you and fired, a blue beam shot out, hitting you square in the chest, you smiled this was it, you were going back to normal, but strangely no, nothing happened. You stared down, the ray was still hitting you, and it was defiantly on, but you weren't shrinking. Maddie stopped the beam, and stared, you waited hoping it would be something like a delayed reaction, but still nothing happened, you waited for fourteen minutes, and nothing happened you were still freakishly tall.

"What's wrong," you shouted, now looking worried, Maddie fired again, but again nothing happened, she turned up the power, the energy, the rate, everything, but nothing made any change, you were still a giant, and for some reason the ray had stopped working on you, they tested it on a paint can, and sure enough it shrunk to the size of a screw, but when it hit you, it merely tickled. "What is wrong," you shouted, Maddie looked up timidly, "its stopped working," she replied, "I can see that, why?" you bellowed, "I don't know," Maddie cried, "I'm sorry, please don't hurt me," once again you were overcome with shock, you had to keep your temper, you were scary to her when you were normal size, now you were giant you must be terrifying.

"it’s okay," you said in a softer voice, "just go get your friends parents, they built it there no how to fix it," all eyes turned to her friend, who was looking particularly sheepish, "we can't," she frantically said, "why?" another friend asked, she didn't answer, your eyes narrowed at her, "why can't we ask them?" you said in a firm voice, she remained silent. "Tell me," you shouted, scared now she backed away, "tell me now, before I get angry," you shouted the girl, looked terrified, "okay so I took it without telling them, I meant to return it I'm sorry," she cried. You stared at her shocked, of course, it had been nagging you why to great scientists would leave such an important invention in the hands of a little girl, "well you still have to tell them," you shouted, "or I will be a giant for the rest of my life," still frightened, she walked off to tell them, while Maddie left to tell your parents, somehow you could sense this wasn't going to go well.


You sat there on the hospital bed, it had been four hours since you go here, and you had had so many experiments run on you, that you felt like a lab monkey, the doctors had examined everything, very furiously. Now you just sat there, of all the doctors you had seen you felt sure that at least half of them had just come in to stare at your giant height, you felt like you were in a freak show, because truthfully that’s what you are now, a freak, and that’s where you belong, it felt so weird to be so tall, to have everything no matter how strong groan when you sat upon it, to be strong enough to lift another man like a doll, it was so odd, that was something you had to remember to ask about, what was all this new found strength, even at this height, it wasn't natural.

The door opened, slowly you looked over, standing there was your sisters friends parents, "hello," her father said, "how are you," her mother said, you stared at the two, "skip the formalities," you said, "when can you fix this problem?" the two of them remained in silence, you could sense something was wrong, "what is it?" you asked, her father sighed, and walked forward, "I'm terribly sorry Fred," he said sadly, "But there nothing we can do," you stared at him, "what? But the ray, it changed size, you just need to fix the..." he cut you off, "you see," the mother began, "the ray was a dismal failure, the project was cancelled, all the prototypes were called into be destroyed, except that one that was used, that was kept purely for nostalgia."

"But it worked," you replied, "yes," she said, "it worked, but the thing is, after a while, your body gains immunity to its affects, and adjusts to your new height, making it impossible to change your height any further." You couldn't believe what you were hearing, "but the girls, they changed size, and they changed back," "but they never had such a drastic change as yours," the man said, "that spread up the rate of immunity building, I'm sorry, but you’re stuck like this." You were to shocked to speak, standing up, your head hit the celling and that drove you mad, "NO," you screamed, swing your fist into the wall, you hand collided and went right through the plaster, into the brick, only for that to smash as well, her parents ducked, pulling your hand back, the shock of this, interrupted your sadness. "Why am I so strong?" you asked,

Her father smiled, "that’s quite an interesting one, quite simply, your muscles have all been greatly compressed, to adjust to your sudden great increase in mass, this leads to your strength being increased twelve times, or at least that’s how many times your body weight you can lift." You stared, but in this form you must have weighed over 400 hundred pounds, that meant you could lift over two tons. This shook you to the core, not only were you freakishly tall, but you were unnaturally strong. This was all too much, a simply accident had transformed you from an ordinary, mostly happy teenager, into a giant, with superhuman strength, it was just all too much, you sat down again, and once more were left to think.


You couldn't believe it, despite being transformed into a giant freak; you still had to go to school? You gulped, already worried about how the others were going to react to this, it had been over a week since you had grown, the girls had been severally punished, but that hardly made you feel better, and all your expenses had been cleared, by their family, and you had time to adjust, you now shattered everything you held, and you could now control your strength to a degree, but still? You had to go; this was going to be purgatory for you. Sighing, you walked up to the doors of the school, there was no body outside, and so you were spared the misery for a moment.

But your luck did not last long, suddenly door burst open, another student ran out, straight into you, he was knocked back "hey watch it, you big u..." he trailed off as he continued to look up, before eventually finding your head, his face turned white, he turned around, and he ran off screaming, you looked after him, and as you did you hung your head. Still sad, you walked through the corridors, all heads turned to face you as you past, the worst part was, your school had high ceilings, and yet you still had to bend down to walk through them, you felt exactly like a freak, a giant freak of nature. Almost crying you made it to your classroom; you had to kneel down to get through the door.

The moment you got through silence fell, all eyes stared at you, except one pair. Your teacher Mrs Jenkins, wasn't looking she was looking down under her desk, not looking up, she said "Are Fred is that you?" "Yes miss," you replied in a hushed voice, "well take your seat," she mummed, you looked at the tiny chair, and you knew you would never fit in that thing, not now. "I can't miss," you replied, "and why not," she said, still rummaging below her desk, "I don't think I'll fit," you replied, "what you talking about, of course you’re... MY LORD WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU," she screamed finally catching sight of you. "I had a Growth spurt" you causally replied.

Laughter broke out through the class, your eyes narrowed, the laughter vanished, "seriously, what happened to you, growing like that's not natural," Mrs Jenkins said, of course people couldn't know that there was a machine that shrunk people in existence, so you had been briefed not to tell, and given a cover story. “you know how we grow?" you asked, "your pubic gland in your brain, secretes a special hormone, well my dams all burst." You paused but only silence replied, "For the last week, my brain kept spilling out this hormone, causing me to made this sudden and shocking increase in height, according to the doctor, it’s called, selected Gigantism, it only effects on in every billion people, and it’s never been on this scale before."

"but growing that much, should kill you," someone said, you turned to face them, "well it didn't happen all at once," you replied, "it was a gradual process that lasted almost all week." the class seemed to take your explanation, but most didn't seem to care, sighing you sat down on your table, well aware that almost all eyes were on you. After class it didn't get better, as you walked the halls everyone avoided you, no one got in your way, they were all clearly far too afraid of you, to get her, eyes followed you, whispers echoed behind you, everywhere you went, you knew they were watching you, it was as you feared you were a freak, now and forever...

Maddie said as she put the gun away at the top of a high shelf, to you. What happens now?

1242221.content:

1421211122.content:
"Hee hee, big brother Fred wants to play!"

Light shines in as a quintet of pudgy, wriggly fingers wrap themselves around you and yank you free from your little sister's cheeks.

The soft, warm fingers let you go as you gain solid ground under your knees, and a monolith in your face.

Seeing the sheer cliff face of white stretch before you makes you rethink referring to her as your "little" sister.

Your li- big sister pats the white surface while lifting you by the hand.

"You were pretty fun in there Fred, if you're not as much fun outside..." She gives a final pat, causing a small "boom" to your ears. "...Then you're going back in!" She trailed off with a giggle, even that causing your chest to reverberate slightly.

It was remarkable how different Haley looked from here. It was probably because you never really looked at her; after all, she was never your responsibility as much as the sister's or Mom's, but she looked so much... Clearer. Defined? Her features stood out. It sounds obvious, given the circumstances, but it was just so surreal. Her brown hair tied into two different short little tufts on top of her head were cable wires, her round, chubby cheeks concealed the facial structure that she would grow into. Her lips, and a bit of her chin glistened with saliva, catching and refracting light. No part of her was small enough to escape notice; no part of her could be ignored.

This four-year-old sat in complete opposition to you. You doubted Haley could even notice the expression on your face; which would've been useful, seeing as it was anywhere between "abject fear" and "awestruck".

The toddler pushed her legs out behind her and maneuvered herself to lie in front of you, exacerbating the detail overload of her face. She must have been no more than a few inches away from you. Had you the bravery, you could walk two paces and touch her lips.

The floor began to shake as she spoke, her words rattling your very bones.

"Itty-bitty Fred and the big, bad, Haley!"

Her lips puckered and before you could even question what was going on, a hurricane-force wind slammed into you, sending you flying what felt like ten feet, though you knew at your size it was only a few inches. As you hit the floor hard, a massive, cruel at your size, laugh bellowed from your sister.

"Hahaha, you're so puny Fred! So tiny..." The ground quakes. "But so..." Again. "Much..." The light in the room begins to dim in your eyes. "Fun!" Haley's massive head hangs over you, blocking the light bulb way up in the ceiling. She smiles wide, even as your skin goes white.

"Rawr!" A heavy, thick mass of toddler breath crashes onto you, threatening to suffocate you. Hyperventilation does not help, though you're not stopping anytime soon. Your sister, your baby sister, is a titan. A god in a diaper. You're nothing in comparison. A sentient insect, and worth half as much. She could drown you in her spit, she could eat you and be done with it, she didn't even need to be aware of it to completely and utterly snuff your life.

As all of these thoughts, these terrible thoughts no one should have rushed through your mind, Haley, either bored or tired of not seeing a visible reaction, pushed herself to her feet. As you lie there, breath not slowing, a colossal mound of pink flesh hovers over you.

"Fred, wake up~"

Before you can panic anew, the mountain touches down, her sole covering you completely. She lowered her foot- and weight, gently, as the soft skin of the underside of her foot molded around you, sealing you to the floor, trapped in a tight world of pressure and stench.

It wasn't wretched, but with a gasp your sister's unique foot odor filled your nostrils and lungs. Squeezing you with her foot, she turned the term "sole massage" on its head, rubbing and wringing your entire body.

"If Fred keeps being boring, it's back to the diaper~!"
